Bafia: A rìtumɛ̀n, Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghà, nni Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghà ɓɛɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll, Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ki ɓaghà Bɛ̀ll.
I ɓaghà ɓɛɛ̀ Bɛ̀ll a rìtumɛ̀n.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn yɛ̀ɛ kighà ɓyom ɓìcèm, nni ɓi ɓyom ɓi ɓi kilɛ̀ngà, kidɛŋ ki kilɛ̀ngà ɓi kɛ̀ɛ̀ yɔ̀.
Cɛɓ ki ɓaghà ɓi Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, cɛɓ kìn ki ki fafa ɓum kìtɛɛtɛn.
Kìtɛɛtɛn ki lomlòm ɓi birìm, birìm yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki teɗ kɔ.
Bɛ̀ll à romgày ŋwaàdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Zyaŋ.
Nnyɛɛ yughày fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ wusìnɛ̀ɗ à kìtɛɛtɛn lɛ di ɓum ɓɛɛ gherɛn lɛ rìkpaa ɗii.
Nyii ɓaghà ɓi kitɛɛtɛn, kìɓan kifog à yùghày lɛ a kpaà ɓum kìɓan ki kitɛɛtɛn.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn ì ɓaghà kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à kìtɛɛtɛn, ki ki yughà ɓi ziinɛ lɛ kɛɛ kpeŋzi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm.
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghà ɓi ziinɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ki kìghà ziinɛ, wɔ̀lɛ ziinɛ ì yitìghà ɓi yɔ̀.
Ì yughà a ɓum ɓii, ɓum ɓii ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ghàɓ yɔ̀;
wɔ̀lɛ ì faghà ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ghaɓkà kɔ, ɓɛ gherɛ̀n ɗii ɗi yɔ̀, ìtèɗ wulɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ghalà ɓi ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll rì nyoo ì mɛ̀mùù fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ yalàg, lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ faghà ɓɔ cɛɓ ki nyɔn.
Fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ghalà mum ànɛ à ghɛɓkà ɓi nyìinyìm wìs, ǹɗonɛn, rì geesɛ̀n, rì saaɗ, tì ki ghɛngà rìkem ɗii, rìkem ɗìn ɗi ki ɓa ɗi mbobog à Man ànɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày yɛ̀ɛ Seŋì.
Zyaŋ à rɛlìghà wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kii, à làmɓɛ̀n lɛ: Nnyɛɛ ri ŋwaànɛ ǹkpaaghà mìni lɛ: Roànɛ à rìì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m, à lokày rì mɛ̀, ɓisuulɛ nyii ɓaghà di mɛ̀ ǹka yin.
Ɓìsiìcèm tì mɛ teɗ ɓɛmààgh ɓɛ ɓi rìɓa ɗii ɗi à rì ǹɗonɛn, à saàsàgtàg ɓìsi geesɛ̀n.
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi falɛ̀ngà rì Moyis, geesɛ̀n rì saaɗ ɓi yuiy rì Yeesus Kiris.
Mum à ka ghɛngà ɓi Bɛ̀ll, lɔŋ m̀bobog à Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à rì jàŋbog rì Seŋi yɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓɛɛ yi nyi.
Fɛlɛ nnɛ Zyaŋ à kpaaghà yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ romgày ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ rì ɓɛ̀levìt lɛ ɓɛɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ghɛn?
À gherɛ̀ngà kɛ̀ɛ pwàà, à gherɛ̀n, à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yin Kiris.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì min ghɛn? Wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri Eli gìn? Zyaŋ à ɓàg lɛ: Èe èe. Ù rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan anɛ̀n?  Zyaŋ lɛ: Àg.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ ki rì min ghɛn? Tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sugtii ki kpaà ɓumɓɛ ɓaa romiì ɓìsi rìɓàg. Wɛ̀ɛmiɗ kali ɓìsi! Wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ghɛn?
Nni Zyaŋ à ɓàkà lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì roànɛ a làalam̀ɓɛ̀n ɓi-reɓ lɛ pègsɛɛna bee ì Kan, lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii à kpaaghà.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ romgày ɓɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ, ɓɛ ɓaghà Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ.
Nni ɓɛ tɔgtìghà nyi lɛ: I wɔ̀ ki yin Kiris, nsoò lɛ Eli, nsoò ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓisuucɛ nnɛ u ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓum? Zyaŋ à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ:
Mɛ̀ɛ mɓàaɓaɓtì ɓum rì mɛ̀nig, kìɓan kifog ŋwaàdɛŋ à rì foo ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, ànɛ ɓì yii ɓi; nyi yɛɛ riì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m.
Mɛ̀ ǹwuɓsɛɛ gì ɓi nkoŋ wulɛ ǹfùmì ǹɗig wii wu gòò.
Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi kilɛ̀ngà a Bɛtanii, cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ, ɓi jàŋ inɛ Zyaŋ à ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓum.
Ɓi duri tana, Zyaŋ à ghɛngà di Yeesus à tiì a lɔ̀ŋkii, à kpaa lɛ man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a pipisi kiɓe ki ɓum ɓi ziinɛ yɛɛ ri lɛ.
Nnyɛɛ ri roànɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaa lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à rìì mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m, à lokày mɛ̀ beèbɛ̀y, ɓisuulɛ nyii ɓaghà di mɛ̀ ǹka yin.
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yighà ɓi nyi, kìɓan kifog, ǹ-yùghày lɛ mɓaɓti ɓum rì mɛ̀nig, lɛ di Isirayɛl àa yii nyi.
Zyaŋ à kpaatìghà lɛ ǹghɛngà di Ǹghay a sɛnsɛn yi aɗyoo yɛ̀ɛ kuùkuù, à yù nyi kì ɓɛ̀lii ɓi nyòò.

Mɛ̀ ǹ-yighà ɓi nyi, wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ lɛ mɓààɓàɓtì ɓum rì mɛ̀nig, à kpaaghà mɛ̀ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ ù rì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ di Ǹghay à sɛniì, ɓi nyoo à rɔ̀ɓ ɓi nyi, roànɛ̀n yɛɛ ɓiì ɓàɓtii ɓum rì Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
Mɛ̀ ǹghɛngà kìɓan kiǹ, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkpaaghà miì lɛ, nnyɛɛ ri Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓi duri tana, Zyaŋ à ɓaghà di à kaka wɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɓɛɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà di Yeesus a ghaghààgh, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Man à jɔ̀ɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll innɛ.
Kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ kii ki ɓɛyilàg ki wokà com ki à kpaaghà, ki ki nɔ̀ɔ̀ti Yeesus.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngày, à ghɛn lɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔnɔɔ̀tìì nyi, nni à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Cɛ ɓi kaakàà? Ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Raɓì, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ ǹɗèsàg, fennɛ ù kɔ̀kɔrii?
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Yùunay, di ɓi ghɛǹ. Nni ɓɛ kɛǹgà ɓɛ ghɛn jàŋ inɛ à kɔ̀kɔ̀rìghà, ɓɛ ratɛ̀n kì ghagsii ŋwos anɛ̀n ri nyi, ki ɓaghà nunùg mɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛnin à ŋwos nkɛ̀nɛn.
Andire à geni Simɔn Pyɛɛri à ɓaghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ wokà kìɓan ki Zyaŋ à kpaaghà, ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tì Yeesus.
Andire ànɛn à lokà kì tanɛɛ ri Simɔn à geni, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Tyàa ghɛɛ Mèsii, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ Kiris.
Fɔɔnnɛ à syògà Simɔn yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus. Yeesus à fiɓì nyi à kpaa lɛ: Simɔn, man à Zyonas ɓɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì reŋɗaagh lɛ Sefas, yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ Pyɛɛri .
Ɓi duri tana Yeesus à ɓekà lɛ a kɛǹ a Galile, nni à tanɛ̀ngà Filiɓ à kpaa nyi lɛ: Nɔ̀ɔ̀ti mɛ̀.
Filiɓ à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ a Bɛdsayida, ɓi bàn ì ɓɛ̀-Andire ɓɛɛ̀ Pyɛɛri.

Fɔɔnnɛ Filiɓ à tuusɛ̀ngà rì Natanayɛl, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Tyàa ghɛɛ ŋwaànɛ kìɓan kii ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi kaàtà à ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis rì ɓi ɓɛ̀kaàtà ɓɛ ɓɛkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, nnyɛɛ ri Yeesus à man à Yoosɛɓ ànɛ a Naazarɛt.
Nni Natanayɛl à kpaaghà Filiɓ lɛ: Cɛ ki cem kɛɛ ri lɛ ki kpaŋ yì a Naazarɛt? Fɔɔnnɛ Filiɓ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Yuiy u ghɛǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà di Natanayɛl a yùyuiy nyi a nyoo nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Natanayɛl à rì kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à muu Isirayɛl ànɛ à yin ɗi mɛ̀ɗyɔg.
Nni Natanayɛl à tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ yii mɛ̀ fe? Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Màa ghɛɛ wɔ̀ cààmɛ̀n ki wàa rì a nɗyèm wu fìgyee zi, di Filiɓ à ka reŋii ɓi wɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Natanayɛl à kpaaghà min Yeesus lɛ: Raɓì, ù rì Man à Bɛ̀ll, ù rì rìfòm ɗi Isirayɛl.
Yeesus à bàg nyi lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkalii wɔ̀ lɛ màa ghɛɛ wɔ̀ a nɗyèm wu fìgyee zi, nnɛ ù gherɛɛ, ù rì ɓiì ki ghɛɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓi teghɛɛ ɓi cee fɔlɔɔ.
Ǹkalii mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, ɓì rì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ di ɗyoo ɗi nɛmɓɛɛ, ɓum ɓɛ titom ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ɓɔɓɔ̀g ɓɛ sɛnsɛ̀n Man à mum a nto.
Ajɛ̀m ì mɛ̀ru mɛraa, kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ ki riwɛy ki ɓaghà a Kana, ɓi zi ì Galile, jɛɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà wɔɔ.
Ɓɛ reŋìghà girig Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii a kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ kiǹ.
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ lekà, nni jɛɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ɓɛ yiìdi ri mɛ̀rɔ̀g.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Giɓ anɛ, cɛ kɛɛ ri lɛ rì mɛ̀ rì wɔ̀? Cààmɛ̀n kɛm̀ ki ka kpaŋ ɓi.
Jɛɛ à kpaa ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay lɛ: Kìina com kìcèm ki à rì mìni ɓiì kalii.

Bèè yi mɛnig yi yi ɓaghà yì yèŋɛn ɗi gɔ̀g, yi ɓaghà wɔɔ taàfog; bèè yiǹ yi ɓaghà foo lɛ, yɛɛ ghɛɓsi ɓisuu ɓisyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi ritɛn ɓi ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n; bog ì ɓaghà lɛ ì kpaŋ ɓɛ̀kpɛm  ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ nsoò lɛ ɓɛraa.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Roòziina mɛ̀nig ɓi bèè yi, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ roòzàkà mɛ̀nig miì, lɛ pisa.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓɔ̀rina min mɔ, ɓi kɛǹ kì faà ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀sì-ɓìɓan ɓi kisɛ̀nɛ̀. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà nyi rì mɔ.
Yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ̀sì-kìsɛ̀nɛ̀ à ɓoɓtìghà mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ ɓaghà mɛǹ di maa ghay mɛrɔ̀g, kɛ̀ɛ yi jàŋ inɛ mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛǹ mɛ ɓaa yì, kɔm̀ lɛ ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓwɛɗkày mɛ̀nig ɓɔɔ yighà.

Fɔɔnnɛ à reŋìghà ŋwaànɛ à wɔlɛ̀ngà à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛɛ̀ loki kìfaà ɓɛ̀kèn mɛrɔ̀g mɛ syeesyee, ɓɛ siitɛ̀n ɓɔ kìfaà mɛ ɓeɓtɛn di ɓaa ŋwagì; kìɓan kifog wɔ̀ wàa ɓèŋɓeŋi mɛ̀rɔ̀g mɛ syeesyee à kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Yeesus à kìghà dàm yìì i ǹtonto a Kana, ɓi zi ì Galile, à rèsì rìgwey ɗii, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ki gherɛn nyi.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, nnɛ à sɛngà a Kapɛrinawum ǹɗaŋ ri jɛɛ, rì ɓɛ̀geni, rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, ɓɛ ghagsì lɔŋ ɓɔɔ mɛru wɔɔ lɛsàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ tìcàɓ ti Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ti lɛ Paskà ti kɛɛkɛ̀ɛ̀ghày, nni Yeesus à ɓɔkà a Yorisalɛm.
À tanɛ̀n di ɓɛ ri ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll lɛ rì ɓɛ̀kàɓì sanìnya, rì ɓɛ̀kàɓì bwiy, rì ɓɛ̀kàɓì ɓɛ̀kuùkuù, rì ɓumɓɛ ceeceǹɗìyɛ̀n ɓum mɔ̀ɔ̀ni.

Yɛ̀ɛ à kìlɛ̀ngà ǹkpas rì ɓìsɔŋ, nni à nàɓkà ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à nàɓkì girig lɛ rì bwiy yaa, rì ɓɛ̀sanìnya ɓaa; à tyàŋzì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ceècèǹɗìghà ɓum mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, à tyɔkì ɓɛ̀teɓèrè ɓaa;
à ki kpaa ɓɛ̀kàɓì ɓɛ̀kuùkuù lɛ: Pisiina ɓyom ɓi fɛ! Kɛ̀ ɓi ghaasi naa ì Seŋi wɛ̀m mɛɛ mɛ fyèè.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ yitìghà lɛ ki ri kì kànɛn lɛ: Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à naa yɔ̀ɔ̀ à ɓuni mɛ̀ ǹɗem.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ tekà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Dàm ì be yɛɛ̀nɛ ù rì lɛ ù kì, lɛ u resi ɓìsi lɛ, ù rì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ u ki yɛ̀ɛ ù kìi yì lɔɔ?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Wààghiina na-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ mpɛɛ̀zi yɔ̀ ki toŋì ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛraa.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ ɓɛ togà bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì bèg taàfog, yɛɛ̀nɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì ɓiì pɛ̀ɛ̀zii kitoŋì ɓi mɛ̀ru mɛraa?
Wɔ̀lɛ naà-Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ Yeesus à kalìghà, ì ɓaghà nyoo yìì.
Yɛ̀ɛ à ghèmɓɛ̀ngày a nyɔ̀ɛ̀y, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ yitì lɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓì kànɛn, ɓɛ ki gherɛn ti kìɓan ki Yeesus à kpaaghà kiǹ.
Cààmɛ̀n ki Yeesus à ɓaghà a tìcàɓ ti a Paskà Yorisalɛm, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà dàm yi ɓiɓan yi à kìkìghà.
Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à tyweeyàkà ɓi ɓɔ ɓisuulɛ, à yighà ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm,
rì tì lɛ, ki ghɛɓsìghà ɓi nyi com lɛ ɓɛɛ ka rèsi nyi rìɓa ɗi mum, lɛ nyimiɗ a yighà com ki mum a fèfeg ɓi ǹɗem ɓi ɗùm.
Nni ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɗii lɛ Nikodɛm, à ɓaghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀lem ɓɛ ɓum ɓɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n,
à yùghà yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus rì ìru à kpaa nyi lɛ: Raɓì, tì yii lɛ, ù rì ǹɗèsàg ànɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ romiì ɓisuulɛ, ŋwaà yin lɛ à kì dàm yi ɓiɓan yɛ̀ɛ yi wɔ̀ɔ kìki yi, di Bɛ̀ll à yin a lɔ̀ŋkii.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ǹkpaa wɔ̀ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, i mum à yalɛɛ tì ɓi nyɔɔnyɔn à rìyalɛ̀n, à yin lɛ à ghɛn kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ Nikodɛm à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Lannɛ mum à rì lɛ à yalɛ̀ntì di à ti ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn? À rì nya lɛ à sugtì ɓi ɗùm ɗi jɛɛ à yalɛ̀ntì?
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ǹkpaa wɔ̀ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, i mum à yalɛɛ ɓi ri mɛ̀nig rì Ǹghay, à yin lɛ à ɗiŋì ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki Bɛ̀ll.
Lɛ ŋwaànɛ à yalɛɛ rì mɛ̀mùù, à rì lɔŋ mum à mɛ̀mùù, roànɛ à yalɛɛ rì Ǹghay à rì ǹghay.
Fɔɔnnɛ kɔ̀ɔ kuurag lɛ màa kpaa wɔ̀ lɛ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓi ɓiìti kì yalɛɛ.
Bɛ̀ɓ ì ti ì fɛɓsag jàŋ inɛ ì kɔni, wɔ̀ɔ̀ wowòg lɔŋ lɛ rìfiŋfìŋ kɔ̀ɔ yi fennɛ ì pɛ̀sɛɛ yì, nsoò jàŋ inɛ yɛɛ̀ kɛ̀nkɛ̀n. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à mɛ yalɛn ri Ǹghay à rì.
Nni Nikodɛm à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà nyi lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ ki ri lɛ ki kilɛ̀n di ki ɓaɓaa là?
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ lɔŋ nɗèsàg ànɛ a Isirayɛl, kɔ̀ɔ ki yi ɓiɓan ɓi?
Ǹkpaa wɔ̀ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, ɓìsiì kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi tì yii, tì ki tɛɛtɛɛ̀zì ɓum ɓìɓan ɓi tì ghɛngà, kìɓan kifog kɛ̀ ɓi kɔ̀n lɛ di ɓyàa teri rìrèsì ɗis.
I ɓì ti kɛ̀ ɓi gherɛn di ǹkpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ziinɛ, lannɛ ɓì rì min ɓiì gherɛɛ di ǹkpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓi aɗyòò?
Ŋwaàdɛŋ à ka ɓɔkà ɓi aɗyòò i ki cee ɓi lɛ Man à mum ànɛ à sɛngày aɗyòò.
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Moyis à pɛ̀sìghà nyoo ɓi kìgeŋ aɗyoo ɓi-reɓ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ girig lɛ, ɓɛɛ pɛsi Man à mum aɗyoo,
lɛ di mum ǹcèm ànɛ à gherɛɛ nyi, à ɓa rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll à keesìghà ziinɛ à pyàŋdàg fɔlɔɔ nnɛ à faghà m̀bobog wìì a Man lɛ ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ nyi kɛ̀ɛ wu, a ɓa lɔŋ ri cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Lɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgày ɓi Man wiì ɓi ziinɛ lɛ a fa yɔ̀ bɛ̀lɛn, à romgày lɔŋ nyi lɛ a ghɛɓsi yɔ̀.
Ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ nyi à yiìdi ri bɛ̀lɛn wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à gherɛɛ ɓi nyi yɛɛ ti rì bɛ̀lɛn ɓisuulɛ, à gherɛ̀ngà ɓi mbobog à Man à Bɛ̀ll.
Bɛ̀lɛn i rì ǹto lɛ: Kìtɛɛtɛn ki yughày ɓi ziinɛ, ɓum ɓɛ ki keesi birìm à cee kìtɛɛtɛn kìn, lɛ mɛ̀kìkìì maa mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀ɓeɓtɛn.
Lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ a kìki kiɓe, à ti à ɓèèzàg kìtɛɛtɛn, kɛ̀ɛ ki yù jàŋ inɛ kìtɛɛtɛn ki ri, lɛ ìris wulɛ ɓìɓan ɓii ɓyɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki kpagi dan.
Wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ à ti à kìlàg ɓìɓan ɓi saaɗ, nnyɛɛ ti à yùlàg jàŋ inɛ kìtɛɛtɛn ki ri, lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ, a kìki ɓiɓan yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓi ziì Zyude; à ghagsìghà cààmɛ̀n wɔɔ ri ɓɔ, à ki ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓum.
Zyaŋ girig à ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓum a Enɔŋ, jàŋbog rì Salim lɛ mɛ̀nig mɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey. Nni ɓum ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà wɔɔ lɛ a ɓaɓti ɓɔ.
Lɛ ki ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka pig ɓi Zyaŋ ɓi naà-zày.
Nni nyoey yi kpighà lɛ rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Zyaŋ, rì muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki ritɛn, ɓi ɓìsyɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi righerɛ̀n ɗi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kɛngà yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Raɓì, ŋwaànɛ ɓìi nɗì rì nyi cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ, ànɛ wɔ̀ɔ ntɛɛzsii ɓìsi rìɓa ɗii, à ti girig ɓiì ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓum, fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ̀ sùusuùrɛ̀n a lɔ̀ŋkii.
Nni Zyaŋ à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Mum à yin lɛ à ɓa rì com kidɛŋ, ki ki yin ki Bɛ̀ll à faa nyi.
Mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛ, ǹkpaaghà lɛ, àa mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Kiris, kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ romgày mɛ̀ lɛ nsyoŋ̀ yì nyi bee.

Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì giɓ, yɛɛ ri yii giɓ; wɔ̀lɛ rìghan ɗi yii giɓ ɗi ɗi ri wɔɔ ɗi ti ɗi nyaàràg yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀nɔ̀ɓɔ̀, lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì yii giɓ inɛ ɗyɛɛ̀ wowòg. Rìkuu ɗi kinyàà ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi mɛ̀ ǹɗì ǹɗonɛn ri ɗyɔ̀.
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ nyii ɓɔɓɔg, mɛ̀ nsisìlì.
Ŋwaànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì aɗyoo, à teŋmɛɛ à cee ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm; roànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì ɓi ziinɛ, à rì lɔŋ ŋwaànɛ ɓi ziinɛ, fɔɔnnɛ a ki kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi ziinɛ. Ŋwaànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì a ɗyoo,
ɓìɓan ɓi à ghɛngà rì ɓi à wokà ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi a rèrèsì; nni mum à ki teri ɓi rirèsì ɗii ɗiǹ.
I mum à ki teri rìrèsì ɗii, di à gherɛɛ yɛɛ lɔɔ lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à kpaaghì saaɗ.
Ɓisuulɛ, roànɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgày, a kakali ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll; lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti à roòzàg nyi rì Nghay wìì lɛ pisa.
Seŋi à keesii Man, fɔɔnnɛ à faghà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyàg ɓii.
Nni mum ǹcèm ànɛ à gherɛɛ Man, à rì rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀; ŋwaànɛ à woogh ɓi nyi, àa ghɛn ɓi cɛɓ, kìɓan kifog, rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi kaka nyi ɓi nyòò.
Yeesus à wokà lɛ ɓɛ nkalii Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ lɛ nyiì syòŋsyoŋ ɓum à cee Zyaŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, à ki ɓàaɓaɓtì ɓɔ;
wɔ̀lɛ ɓi saaɗ à rìkpaa, Yeesus nyimiɗ a ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓi ɓum, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛɛ ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà a Zyude à sugtì a Galile.
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà lɛ, a fyeè a Samari.
Nni à kpagà ɓi bàn ìdɛŋ ìnɛ a Samari ɗii lɛ Sikar, jàŋbog rì dɛm inɛ Yakɔɓ à faghà man wiì ànɛ lɛ Yoosɛɓ.
Kìɗig ki Yakɔɓ ki ɓaghà ɓi dɛm inɛ̀n; Yeesus à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi nwɔŋì wu kiɗig kiǹ, di à mɛ fɔy rikɛ̀ɛ̀; ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì ɓaà nunùg toroɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ giɓ anɛ a Samari à yùghà kì roògh mɛ̀nig, Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Faa mɛ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛ nɔyɛn.
Lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ kɛngà kì làghiì ɓìɗilàg ɓi bàn.
Nni giɓ anɛ a Samari ànɛn à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Lannɛ wɔ̀ muu Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n, ù lɔni mɛ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛ nɔyɛn, kɔm̀ lɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì giɓ anɛ a Samari? Lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ ɓɛ wooghrɛ̀n ɗì ɓumɓɛ a Samari.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ: I wàa yii rìfa ɗi Bɛ̀ll, ù ki yi roànɛ à lɔni wɔ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛ nɔyɛn, di wɔ̀ yaa rì lɛ, ù lɔn nyi mɛ̀nig mɛ noyɛn, di àa ki faa wɔ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛ cɛɓ.
Nni giɓ anɛ̀n à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan, wɛ̀ɛnɛ̀n kɛ̀ɛ̀ com ki lɛ ù rog mɛ̀nig miì, kìɗig ki ki rì kìrimɛn, nni mɛ̀nig mɛ cɛɓ mɛ ri wɔ̀ ɓiì ɓaà yì fe?
U fèfeg lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ cee seŋi wìs a ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀ anɛ lɛ Yakɔɓ, ànɛ à faghà ɓìsi kìɗig ki, nyimiɗ, rì ɓɔn ɓii, rì ɓìtuwe ɓii, ɓɛ nɔ girig kɔ̀?
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Mum ǹcèm ànɛ à nɔɔ mɛ̀nig mɛ, à rì ti lɔŋ ɓiì woògh kìnɔli.
Kìɓan kifog, ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì nɔɔ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛ ǹɗì nyi ɓiì faà, àa wogtii gɛ ɓi kinɔli. Lɛ mɛ̀nig mɛ ǹɗì nyi ɓiì faà mɛǹ, mɛ ri ɓiì ghalì ǹsim à cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi nɗem wii.
Nni giɓ anɛ̀n à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan, faa mɛ̀ mɛ̀nig mɛǹ, di kìnɔli kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kìti mɛ, kɛ̀ɛ nki yùti kiroògh mɛ̀nig fɛ.
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Kɛ̀nay kìreŋii yii wɔɔ̀, di u sugtiì fɛ.
Nni giɓ a ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yin ɗi yii. Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ ù kpaa saaɗ yɔɔ̀ kalii lɛ ù yin ɗi yii;
ɓisuulɛ, ù ti mɛ̀wɛy mɛtaǹ, nni ŋwaànɛ ù rì rì nyi ɓigomìnɛ, à yin yii wɔɔ̀, fɔɔnnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ wàa kpaa ì rì miì.
Nni giɓ a kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan! Ǹghɛɛ lɛ, ù rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ mɓɔgsaagh Bɛ̀ll ɓi dòn ìnɛ, kìɓan kifog mìnii kpaaghì lɛ, a Yorisalɛm nnɛ ɓum ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓɔgsaagh Bɛ̀ll.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Giɓ anɛ! Gherɛn rìkpaa ɗyɛ̀m, lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki riì, ki ɓyàa ɓɔgsi ti ɓi Tààta ɓi dòn ìnɛ, nsoò lɛ a Yorisalɛm.
Lɛ mìniì ɓɔɔɓɔgsì com ki ɓì yii ɓi, ɓìsiì ɓɔɔɓɔgsì com ki tì yii, lɛ gòri ì ɓum ì pɛ̀sɛɛ yì a Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.
Wɔ̀lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki tiì, kiŋcèm ki mɛ ki kpaŋ, ki ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ̀ɓɔgsì Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ ri ɓiì ɓɔgsii Tààta rì nghay, rì saaɗ. Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsì nyi fɔlɔɔ ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ Tààta a kaakàà.
Bɛ̀ll àrì Nghay, fɔɔnnɛ ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì nyi ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi nyi rì nghay, rì saaɗ.
Fɔɔnnɛ giɓ anɛ̀n à kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Ǹ-yii lɛ Mèsii à ɓiì yùu, ànɛ à rì ɗii lɛ Kiris. Yɛ̀ɛ à ri yù, à ri kali ɓisi ɓiɓan ɓìcèm.
Yeesus à kpaa min nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ ànɛ ntòtog anɛ rì wɔ̀, mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri Mèsii.

Ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ innɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ sugtìghày, ɓɛ kuuràg yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà nyi di a tòtog ri giɓ, kìɓan kifog, kìbog ki ɓi ɓɔ ki ghɛɛsìghà ɓi lɛ, kɛɛ tɔg nyi lɛ, la yɛɛ ri? Nsoò lɛ cɛ kɛɛ̀ki u kpaakpaa ri giɓ anɛ?
Nni giɓ a càɗkà bèè yiì ì mɛ̀nig, à sugtì ɓi bàn, à kpaa ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ lɛ:
Yùuna kìghɛɛ̀ ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ àa kpaa mɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi m̀mɛ kì, ɓaà yi ɓi nnyɛɛ ri Kiris.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛ pɛsɛ̀ngày ɓi bàn, ɓɛ yu jàŋ inɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà.
Ɓi nyìinyìm ànɛn, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzìghà nyi, di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: Raɓì, ɗiya ɓà maa com.
Kìɓan kifog Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹɗì rì ɓìɗilàg ɓidɛŋ ɓi nɗi, ɓi mìnii yii ɓì.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ tɔɔ̀ghtɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀ngà wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaàdɛŋ àa rì nya lɛ, à yùy nyi rì com ki ɗiyɛn giǹ?
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓìɗilàg ɓyɛm̀ ɓi ri lɛ nki rìkɔ̀n ɗi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀, ǹki lègsi kisay ki à faghà mɛ̀.
Mìnii ti ɓì kpaaghì lɛ ɓɛ̀ŋwii ɓaa rɔ̀ɓ ɓɛnin lɛ mɛ̀saŋ mɛɛ tumɛn. Nni mɛ̀ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, pìighna mis ɓi ghɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ ɓyom ɓyaa tèɗ ɓi ɓɛ̀dɛm lɛ, ɓɛɛ saŋ.
Ǹsaŋì-mɛ̀saŋ à mɛ teɗ mɛlèɓ mii, à ki taŋzɛn ɓiɗùn ɓisuu cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, lɛ di m̀ɓɛ̀lì-ɓyom rì ǹsaŋì-mɛ̀saŋ, ɓɛɛ nyaàrɛn ǹɗaŋ.
Ɓisuulɛ dàɗkì ìnɛ lɛ, i mum bog à ɓɛ̀li, roàmbog à saŋ, ì rì saaɗ.
Ǹɗomgà mìni lɛ ɓi kɛǹ mɛ̀saŋ ɓi dɛm inɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛɛ salà, mìnii ki ɗiŋi ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɔɔ mɛ say kɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛ̀tɔɓ.
Ɓumɓɛ a Samari lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓi bàn ìnɛn, ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Yeesus, ɓi rìkpaa ɗi giɓ anɛ̀n à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ àa kpaa mɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi m̀mɛ kì.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ a Samari ɓɛ yughày nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ ɓɔŋzàg nyi lɛ a kɔri a lɔ̀ŋkaa. Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ghagsìghà mɛ̀ru mɛɓɛɛ̀ wɔɔ.
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi Yeesus nyimiɗ a kpaakpààghà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà giɓ anɛ̀n lɛ, àa rìkpaa ɗyɔɔ ɗyɔ rì ɗyɔ ɗyɛɛ kiì lɛ ti gherɛn. Tì gherɛɛ ɓigomìnɛ lɛ ɓìsiìɓɔmiɗ tì woogh ɓìtòkì ɓii, tì ki yi lɛ, à rì Ǹghɛɓsì-ziinɛ a tààkaà.
Yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ru mɛ kiɓɛ̀ɛ̀ mɛǹ mɛ ghaghìghà, nni Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà wɔɔ lɛ a kɛǹ a Galile.
Lɛ nyimiɗ a kalìghà lɛ: Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a maà kem ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà a Galile, ɓumɓɛ wɔɔ ɓɛ ghaɓ nyi lɛ syeesyee, lɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi à kìghà a Yorisalɛm, ɓi cààmɛ̀n à tìcàɓ ti Paskà, lɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɛǹgà girig tìcàɓ tiǹ.
Fɔɔnnɛ à sugtìghà min a Kana, ɓi zi ì Galile, jàŋ inɛ à ghaasìghà mɛ̀nig mɛrɔ̀g. Ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ rifòm adɛŋ à ɓaghà a Kapɛrinawum, nni man wiì à baŋì à roròɓkà.

Yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à wokà lɛ, Yeesus àa m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì a Zyude, à yù a Galile, fɔɔnnɛ à kɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, à ɓɔ̀ŋzàg nyi lɛ, ɓɔɔ sɛǹ a Kapɛrinawum, ànɛ̀n a wɔɔ̀zi man wiì à baŋì, ànɛ à ɓaghà di à ti ɓiì kɔ̀ɔkɔɔ̀sì.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Mìnii ri lɔŋ lɛ, i ɓì ghɛɛ ɓi dàm yi ɓiɓan, rì ɓɛ̀koŋnyoo ɓɛ ɓiɓan, kɛ̀ ɓi gherɛn.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹkɔ̀mɛ̀n-ɓɛ̀sujàà à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Kan yuiy ɓà a mɛɛ mɛm̀ di ŋwɔɓti wɛ̀m à ka maasi ɓi.
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɛ̀na man wɔɔ̀ à rì cem. Ŋwaànɛ̀n à gherɛ̀ngà rìkpaa ɗi Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi ɗìn, fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà à kɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ à sɛnsɛ̀ngà a mɛɛ, nni ɓɛ̀kìì-ɓìsay ɓii ɓɛ yughà nyi kìɓoŋì ɓi bee, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Man wɔɔ̀ à rì cem.
Fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà ɓɔ lɛ: Fin innɛ nyoo yìì yàa sààmɛɛ? Ɓɛ ɓag̀ nyi lɛ: Ìi nsààmɛɛ rìŋ̀kò ɓi cààmɛ̀n à rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗìfog.
Fɔɔnnɛ seŋi man ànɛ̀n à yitìghà lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Yeesus àa nkpaa nyi lɛ: Man wɔɔ̀ à rì cem. Nni à gherɛ̀ngà Yeesus rì rìmɛɛ ɗii ɗicèm.
Dàm ìnɛn yɛ̀ɛ ɓaghà dàm ì kìɓɛ̀ɛ̀ inɛ Yeesus à kìghà a Galile, di à ɓaa yì a Zyude.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà rì tìcàɓ, fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓɔkà a Yorisalɛm.
A Yorisalɛm, coo kiɗig kidɛŋ ki ri wɔɔ, jàŋbog rì rìɗigì ɗi ɓi bàn ɗi lɛ, ìsuunaa wu jɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓɛ regì kɔ ɓi kìtòkì ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ: Bɛtzata; kìɗig kiǹ ki ɓaghà ɓɛ̀tuùtuu mɛtaǹ.
Ɓìtuu ɓi ɓɛroroɓ ɓi nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ŋdɛ̀ngà a ɓɛ̀tuùtuu ɓɛ̀n zi, lɛ rì ɓɛ̀ɗyaŋɗyàŋ, [rì ɓɛ̀lɛnlɛm, rì ɓìwɔ̀g, ɓɛ ɓoŋɓòŋ lɛ mɛ̀nig mɛɛ nyɛŋ̀ɗɛn.

Lɛ ŋwaà-fìtom àa nti à sɛngìì ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓidɛŋ ɓi kìɗig kiǹ, à nyɛ̀ŋzì mɛ̀nig; fɔɔnnɛ ki mɓalàg lɛ, i mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ nyɛ̀ŋɗɛ̀n, ŋwaànɛ à loogh miì kì kpìi, àa soo roròɓ rìkuu ɗi firoɓ aɗi, à wɔ̀n.]
Nni roròɓ àdɛŋ à ɓaghà wɔɔ di à mɛ finɛn ɓi fìroɓ, bèg rìtin ɗì ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì taàraa.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà nyi ǹnɔ̀nɔŋiyɛn, à ki yi lɛ, à mɛ finɛn ɓi-kɔ̀ɔ̀ wiǹ, nni à tɔkà nyi lɛ: U kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ di wàa wɔ̀ni?

Roròɓ ànɛ̀n à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Kan, ǹ-yin ɗi mum ànɛ lɛ, à pìg mɛ̀ ɓi kìɗig, di mɛ̀nig mɛ mɛ nyɛŋ̀ɗɛ̀n; lɛ ki ti lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki mɛ̀ɛ nka yeeghyeèghkɛ̀n lɛ nkpi ɓi kìɗig, ŋwaàdɛŋ à log rì mɛ̀.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn aɗyòò, u teɗ kon wɔɔ̀, u kɛɛ̀ghi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ghàskà kì wɔ̀ni, à teɗ kon wiì, à tumɛ̀n rìkɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀. Ŋwos anɛ̀n à ɓaghà ŋwosi Saɓàt.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaaghà ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ wɔɔ̀zìghà ànɛn lɛ: Ŋwosi Saɓàt yɛɛ ri lɛ. Ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis ɓi gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, u tɛg kon wɔɔ̀.
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ ŋwaànɛ àa wɔ̀ɔ̀zii mɛ̀, àa kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Tera kon wɔɔ̀, u kɛɛ̀ghi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà min nyi lɛ: Rìkuu ɗi mum aɗi ɗyaa kpaa wɔ̀ lɔɔ lɛ tera kon wɔɔ̀, u kɛɛ̀ghi?
Wɔ̀lɛ, ŋwaànɛ ɓɛ wɔɔ̀zìghà ànɛn à yighà ɓi ŋwaànɛ à kpaaghà nyi fɔlɔɔ, lɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di à mɛ ɗim ɓi gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à tanɛ̀ngà rì ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù ghɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ ù mɛ wɔ̀n, kɔ̀ɔ kìti kiɓe, di ù rì ɓiì tulɛɛ ri ǹtɔɓ wudɛŋ wu wu cee fɔ̀lɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kɛ̀ngà kì kpaà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ Yeesus yaa wɔ̀ɔ̀zii nyi.
Kɛɛ̀ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà Yeesus, lɛ à kìghà kìɓan kiǹ ŋwosi saɓàt.
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Seŋi wɛ̀m a ka sasày à kpaŋ ɓigomìnɛ, mɛ̀ ǹsasày girig.

Ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn nnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ teèsìghà tì nyoo ɓi rìkaakàà ɗi bee inɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi, àa lɛ rìyogsì ɗi à yoòyògsìghà kìcèlì ki Saɓàt ɗyɔ rì ɗyɔ, lɔŋ ɓisuulɛ à kpaaghà lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì Seŋi wìì, à foŋɗɛn nyimiɗ ɓi nɗɛli wu Bɛ̀ll.

Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà min ɓɔ , à kpaa lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ Man à yin lɛ à kì kìɓan kidɛŋ rì nto wìì, a kìki lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓi a seesèè di Seŋi a kìkì. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓan ɓi Seŋi a kìkì, ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi Man girig a kìkì.
Ɓisuulɛ Seŋi à keesii Man, à ti à rèsàg nyi com kìcèm ki a kìkì. À ki rì nyi ɓiì rèsii ɓiɓan ɓi ɓi cee fɔlɔɔ, lɛ ɓi kuùrag.
Lɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi à ti à ghèmzàg ɓìloŋ, à fa ɓyɔ cɛɓ, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Man à ti à falàg girig ɓumɓɛ à kɔ̀ni cɛɓ.
Seŋi à yin ɓiì renɗeni ɓiɓan ɓi ɓum, wɔ̀lɛ Man innɛ à faghà rìren ɗi ɓiɓan ɗicèm,
lɛ di ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ nyaàsi Man lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛɛ̀ nyaanyaàsì Seŋi. I mum à nyaasii ɓi Man, di à nyaasii ɓi Seŋi ànɛ à romgày nyi.

Ǹkalii mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à woogh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, à ki gherɛn roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀, à ti rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. À yin lɛ à yù a rìren ɗi ɓiɓan, kìɓan kifog, à mɛ pɛ̀sɛn yi ɓi rìwu, à ɗiŋì ɓi cɛɓ.
Nkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ cààmɛ̀n ki riì, kiŋcèm kɛɛ ti lɛ, kɛɛ̀ki ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓiì woògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Man à Bɛ̀ll. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓiì woògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, ɓɛ ɓiì ghɛɓì.
Lɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi à rì rì ìtèɗ wu fayɛn cɛɓ, fɔɔnnɛ à kìghà lɛ, Man a ɓa girig rì ìtèɗ wu fayɛn cɛɓ.
À faghà nyi ìtèɗ wulɛ a yɔm̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓum lɛ, à rì Man à mum.
Nni kɛ̀ ɓi kuurag kiɓan kiǹ; cààmɛ̀n ki tiì, ki ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓi zɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ ɓiì woògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, ɓɛ kpagìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ kighà kìrɔɔ, ɓɛ ri ɓiì ghemɓɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ cɛɓ; ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ kighà kìɓe, ɓɛ ghemɓɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ teɗ bɛ̀lɛn.

Mɛ̀ ǹ-yiǹ ɓiì kìkii kiɓan kidɛŋ rì nto wɛ̀m, nɗenɗen ɓiɓan lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ɛ nwowòg, fɔɔnnɛ rìren ɗyɛ̀m ɗi ɓiɓan ɗi ri lɛ saaɗ lɛ, ǹ-yin ɓiì kaakaa rikɔ̀n ɗyɛm̀, nkaakaa lɔŋ rikɔ̀n ɗi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
I mɛ̀ɛmiɗ yaa rì wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kɛm̀, di com ki ǹɗì lɛ ǹkpaa ki yin lɛ ki wooghrɛ̀n.
Nni yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ ri wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kɛm̀, fɔɔnnɛ ǹ-yii lɛ, com ki a kpaakpaa ɓi san wɛ̀m ki ri saaɗ.
Ɓì romgà ɓum yɛ̀ɛ Zyaŋ, Zyaŋ à rèsì mìni saaɗ ànɛ ɓi rìɓa ɗyɛ̀m.
Ɓi san wɛ̀m, àa mum yɛɛ ri wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ ɓi rìɓa ɗyɛ̀m, kìɓan kifog, ǹkpaa lɔŋ fɔlɔɔ lɛ, di ɓi ɓa rì cɛɓ.
Zyaŋ à ɓaghà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ lamɓà ànɛ a ròòròò, à kpeèkpèŋzì jàŋ, nni ki kɔngà mìni lɛ ɓi nyaàrɛn rì kìtɛɛtɛn kii ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n.
Ǹɗì rì wusìnɛ̀ɗ ànɛ a rèresi kiɓan kɛm̀, à cee rìrèsì ɗi Zyaŋ à rèsìghà, nnyɛɛ ri ɓìɓan ɓi Tààta à faghà mɛ̀ lɛ nki. Ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓyɛɛ̀ rèresi lɛ Tààta yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ Tààta nyimiɗ anɛ à romgày mɛ̀, à rèsìghà girig kìɓan kɛm̀; ŋwos adɛŋ, ɓì ka wokà ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì, kɛ̀ ɓi ki ghɛn ìsu wìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓan ɓii ɓi yin mini ɓi nɗem, lɛ ɓì gherɛɛ ɓi roànɛ à romgày.
Ɓi fifiɓi mɛkànì mɛ kaàtà à Bɛ̀ll, lɛ ɓi fèfeg lɛ ɓi mɛ̀kànì mɛǹ nnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ɓaà rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Mɛ̀kànì mɛǹ mɔ yɛɛ̀ ki rèresi kiɓan kɛm̀.
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, ɓì kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ di ɓyàa yùu yì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ lɛ ɓi ghɛǹ cɛɓ.
Ǹ-yin ɓiì kaakaa rikem a ɓum.
Wɔ̀lɛ ǹ-yii mìni, ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à Bɛ̀ll à yin mini ɓi mɛ̀rem.
Ǹ-yùghà ɓi ɗii ɗi Seŋi wɛ̀m kɛ̀ ɓi kɔ̀n lɛ ɓi ghaɓ mɛ̀, wɔ̀lɛ, i ŋwaàdɛŋ à yùu ɓi ɗii ɗii ɗi nyimiɗ, nyi nnɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ghàɓi.
Lannɛ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì gherɛ̀n, di ɓi faafàlɛ̀n rìkem mìni rì mìni, kɛ̀ ɓi kaa rikem ɗi ɗi riì yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll cɛ̀ncii?
Kɛ̀ ɓi fèg lɛ ǹɗì mìni ɓiì sɔmɛɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta; ŋwaànɛ à rì mìni ɓiì sɔmɛɛ, nnyɛɛ ri Moyis ànɛ ɓì faghà ǹtyweeyi ri nyi,
ɓisuulɛ i ɓì gherɛ̀ngà Moyis, di ɓì rì lɛ ɓì gherɛ̀n mɛ̀, lɛ kìɓan kɛm̀ kɛɛ̀ki à kàngà.
Nni i ɓì gherɛɛ ɓi ɓiɓan ɓi à kàngà, lannɛ ɓì rì ɓiì gherɛɛ ɓi mɛ̀ ǹkpaa?
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à syààghà cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày ànɛ a Galile, ànɛ ɓɛ nɗegì tì lɛ rìɓày ànɛ a Tiɓeriyaadɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ coo kituu ki ɓum ki nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi, lɛ ɓɛ ghɛngà dàm yi à kìkìghà ɓi ɓɛ̀roroɓ ɓɛ à wɔ̀ɔ̀wɔ̀ɔ̀zìghà.
Nni Yeesus à ɓɔkà ɓi dòn aɗyòò, à kɔ̀rì wɔɔ ɓi zi, ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii.
Fɔlɔɔ a ɓaghà di tìcàɓ ti Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ti lɛ Paskà ti ti jàŋbog.
Yeesus à pìkà mis, à ghɛn coo kituu ki ɓum, di kɛɛ̀ yùyuiy nyi a nyoo, fɔɔnnɛ à tɔkà Filiɓ lɛ: Fennɛ tì rì lɛ tì làg bìrɛs ìnɛ lɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛɛ ɗi?
Yeesus à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, a feèghrɛn Filiɓ lɛ, nyimiɗ a yighà com ki à rì ɓiì kìi.
Nni Filiɓ à ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Nsoò bìrɛs ì ɓɛ̀hɔnɗɛ̀ɗ ɓɛ ɓɛtɔɔsìm ɓɛɓɛɛ̀, ì yin lɛ ì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀n lɛ mum ǹcèm à ɗi maa kìɓɛghà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹ-yilàg wìì adɛŋ ànɛ lɛ Andire, geni Simɔn Pyɛɛri à kpaaghà nyi lɛ:
Maa ŋwɔɓti à baŋì àdɛŋ à rì fɛ lɛ, rì bìrɛs yitaǹ yi ɓɛ kii rì rìkuu ɗi gèŋ ɗilɛ ɔrìzɛ̀, rì ɓìzɛn ɓiɓɛɛ̀, nni ɓi ri lɛ ɓi ki cɛ ri gɛ mum ànɛ?
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɔ̀ɔ̀siina ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓi zi. Ɓyaaɓi ɓi ɓaghà ɓi jàŋ inɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey, nni ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ kɔrìghà min ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓaghà nunùg ɓum ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛtaǹ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à tekà bìrɛs, à fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n, à kàɓsì yɔ̀ ri ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà wɔɔ ɓɛǹ; fɔɔnnɛ à fatìghà girig ɓɔ ɓìzɛn gàɓ ìnɛ ɓɛ kɔnkɔ̀ngà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ wuràkà, nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Taŋ̀zɛɛna ɓìɓɛghà ɓi bìrɛs ɓi ɓi rɔɓtaagh lɛ com kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗyoŋ.
Nni ɓɛ ɓadɛ̀ngà ɓìɓɛghà ɓi bìrɛs ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗìghà ɓɛ caɗkà, ɓɛ roòzì ɓìkàɗ ntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiɓɛɛ̀; ɓi bìrɛs yi kitaǹ yi yi ɓaghà yiǹ yi kìyɛn ɗi ɔrìzɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛngà dàm ì kìɓan inɛ̀n, nni ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Roànɛ à rì lɔŋ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan anɛ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ, à ɓiì yùu ɓi ziinɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yighà lɛ ɓɛ ti ɓiì kìi lɛ, ɓɛɛ ɓan nyi, ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi nyi rìfòm ɓi-tèɗ, nni à ghàghìghà à ɓɔgtì ɓi dòn cɛ̀ncii.
Yɛ̀ɛ cɛŋkò ki kpagà, nni ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ sɛngà ɓi rìɓày.
Ɓɛ ɓɔg ɓi kìkɔm lɛ ɓɛɛ syaà cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày a Kapɛrinawum; birìm ì kpìghà di Yeesus à ka tanɛn ɓi lɔŋ ɓɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ bɛ̀ɓ ì fɛɛ̀fɛ̀ɓsìghà rì ìtèɗ, rìɓày à pìpìg ɓìkus.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ fyèè riɓày fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀kilòmɛɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓɛtaǹ nsoò lɛ taàfog, nni ɓɛ ghɛngày Yeesus di a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ yi ɓi rìɓày aɗyòò, à yùyùy jàŋbog rì kìkɔm, ìris wu ɓan ɓɔ.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri, kɛ̀ ɓi risi.
Ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kìghà lɛ, ɓɛɛ teɗ nyi ɓi kìkɔm, nni ki ghaskà kì lomì ɓi bèn ì rìɓày jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà.

Ɓi duri tana, kìtuu ki ɓum ki ki rɔɓkày cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày, ki ghɛngà lɛ, kìkɔm kìfog kɛɛ nɗì wɔɔ. Nni Yeesus àa nki ɓɔɔgh ɓi ɓi kìkɔm kiŋcèm ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, lɔŋ ɓɔ yɛɛ nkɛ̀ɛ ɓi kìkɔm kìn cɛ̀ncaa.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìkɔm ɓidɛŋ ɓi ɓaghày a Tiɓeriyaadɛ, jàŋbog rì jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ɗighà bìrɛs, di Kan à mɛ fa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓumɓɛ̀n ɓɛ ghɛngà lɛ nsoò Yeesus nsoò ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii, àdɛŋ à ɓaghà ɓi wɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɔmiɗ ɓɛ ɓɔkà ɓi ɓìkɔm ɓìn, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kaà Yeesus a Kapɛrinawum.
Ɓɛ kɛǹgà nyi kìtanɛɛ cɛcɛɗ ki riɓày, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Raɓì, wɔ̀ɔ n-yùu fɛ̀ fin?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, àa ɓisuulɛ ɓìi nghɛɛ dàm nnɛ ɓi kaakaa mɛ; ɓi kaakaa mɛ lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìi nɗii bìrɛs ɓì wuràg.

Kɛ̀ ɓi say ɓisuu ɓiɗilàg ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi ɗyoŋ, salina ɓisuu ɓiɗilàg ɓi ɓi ri lɛ ɓi kɔrì à kpaŋ ɓi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ɓyɛɛ̀ ɓi Man à mum à rì mìni ɓiì faà, lɛ nyi nnɛ Bɛ̀ll Seŋi à fogà kìrèmzɛnà ki rilàmì ɗii ɓi nyi.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà Yeesus lɛ: Tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kìi cɛ ɓi ɗi lɛ ti say ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Kìsay ki Bɛ̀ll ki ri lɛ, ɓi gherɛn roànɛ Bɛ̀ll à romgày.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Dàm ì kìɓan aɗi yɛɛ̀ nnɛ ù kìi, ìnɛ ìrì lɛ, i tì ghɛɛ, tì gherɛ̀n wɔ̀? Kìsay aɗi kɛɛ̀ki wɔ̀ɔ kìkì?
Ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓis ɓɛ ɗighà manà ɓi-reɓ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ: À faghà ɓɔ bìrɛs ìnɛ ì rìì aɗyoo lɛ ɓɛɛ ɗi.
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, àa Moyis yɛɛ faghà mìni bìrɛs ìnɛ ì sɛngày aɗyòò, kìɓan kifog Seŋi wɛ̀m yɛɛ faa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à bìrɛs ànɛ à rìì aɗyòò.
Lɛ bìrɛs ì Bɛ̀ll ì rì bìrɛs ìnɛ ì sɛniì aɗyòò, ì ki fa ziinɛ cɛɓ.
Nni ɓɛ kpaaghà min nyi lɛ Kan, falag ɓìsi bìrɛs ìnɛ̀n ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm.
Yeesus à kalìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì bìrɛs ì cɛɓ, ŋwaànɛ à yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ zày, yàa kɔɔdii gɛ ɓi nyi. Ŋwaànɛ à ki gherɛɛ mɛ̀, kìnɔli kaa kitii gɛ ɓi nyi.
Ǹki kpaaghà mìni fɔlɔɔ, ɓì ghɛn mɛ̀, kɛ̀ ɓi ki gherɛn.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ Tààta à faa mɛ̀, ɓɛ ri ɓiì yùu a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, nni màa ki kpaŋzi ɓi ŋwaànɛ à yùu yì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ ɓi ɗyɔ̀m.
Ɓisuulɛ, ǹsɛngày ɓi aɗyoo lɛ nki rìkɔ̀n ɗyɛm̀, ǹsɛngày lɔŋ lɛ nki rìkɔ̀n ɗi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Nni rìkɔ̀n ɗi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi: Lɛ kɛ̀ɛ nɗimzi nsoò mum bog, ɓi ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ à faghà mɛ̀. Ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɔŋ ɓɔ kì ghèmzii, ɓi siitòn a ŋwos.
Lɛ rìkɔ̀n ɗi Seŋi wɛ̀m ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi: Lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à ghɛɛ Man, à ki gherɛn nyi, a ɓa rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, mɛ̀ ǹki ghèmzii gɛ nyi ɓi siitòn a ŋwos.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ŋwɔŋwɔ̀ŋìghà nyi lɛ, à kpaaghà lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì bìrɛs ìnɛ ì sɛngày aɗyòò.
Ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ: Àa Yeesus à man à Yoosɛɓ yɛɛ ri lɛ? Tì yii lɛ rì seŋi rì jɛɛ, nni lannɛ a kpaaghi ɓigomìnɛ lɛ, nyii ri bìrɛs ìnɛ ì sɛngày aɗyòò?
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kɛ̀ ɓi ŋwɔ̀ŋwɔŋi, mìni rì mìni.
Mum à yin lɛ à yù a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ di Tààta ànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ à syòŋiì ɓi nyi, mɛ̀ ǹki ghèmzii gɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n miì ɓi siitòn a ŋwos.

Ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi kaàtà à ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì rèsaagh ɓɔ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm, fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Tààta, à ki teɗ rirèsàg ɗii, nnyɛɛ ri lɛ à yù a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀.
Fɔlɔɔ a rèsii ɓi lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ à ka ghɛngà Tààta, lɔŋ roànɛ à ɓaghày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ ghɛngà Tààta cɛ̀ncii.
Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, à rì rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri bìrɛs ì cɛɓ.
Ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ ɗighà manà ɓi-reɓ, ɓɛ ki cuu.
Lɔŋ bìrɛs ìnɛ ì sɛngày aɗyoo, yɛɛ̀nɛ, lɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɗii yɔ̀, kɛ̀ɛ wù.

Ǹɗì bìrɛs ì cencem ìnɛ ì sɛngày aɗyòò, ŋwaànɛ à ɗii bìrɛs ìnɛ̀n, à rì ɓiì ghɛɓì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Bìrɛs ìnɛ m̀ɓiì faà ìnɛ̀n, yɛ̀ɛ ri nyoo yɛ̀m ìnɛ ǹɗì ɓiì faà, lɛ ziinɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ.
Ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ tumɛ̀ngà rìnyoònyòlɛ̀n ɓɔ rì ɓɔ, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Lannɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì lɛ à fa ɓìsi nyoo yìì lɛ ti ɗi yɔ̀?
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, i ɓì ɗii ɓi nyoo ì Man à mum, kɛ̀ ɓi ki nɔ bwaɓ yii, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì ɓa rì cɛɓ ki kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.
Ŋwaànɛ à ɗii nyoo yɛ̀m, à ki nɔ bwaɓ yɛm̀, à rì rì cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, ǹɗì ɓiì ki ghèmzii nyi ɓi siitòn a ŋwos.
Lɛ nyoo yɛ̀m ì rì ɓìɗilàg ɓi kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀, bwaɓ yɛm̀, kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à com ki nɔyɛ̀n.
Ŋwaànɛ à ɗii nyoo yɛ̀m, à nɔ bwaɓ yɛm̀, à rì ǹɗàrɛn ɗi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ girig ǹɗàrɛn ɗi nyi.
Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta ànɛ à rì cem a romgày mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ǹki ɓa ri cɛɓ lɛ nyi, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ŋwaànɛ à ɗii mɛ̀, à ɓiì ghɛɓì lɛ mɛ̀.
Bìrɛs ìnɛ ì sɛngày aɗyoo yɛ̀ɛ ri lɛ; ì yin yɛ̀ɛ ìnɛ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ ɗighà ɓɛ cuu; nni ŋwaànɛ à ɗii bìrɛs ìnɛ, à rì ɓiì ghɛɓì fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓi, yɛ̀ɛ à rèèrèsàkà ɓum ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n ìnɛ a Kapɛrinawum.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ wokà ɓìɓan ɓi Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓiǹ, nni kìgwey ki kalìghà lɛ: Ɓìtòkì ɓi ɓi teèsɛɛ, ghɛn yɛɛ ri lɛ à cenɛ̀n ɓyɔ rìwowòg?
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à yighà ɓi nɗem wii lɛ ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛɛ̀ ŋwɔ̀ŋwɔŋi nyi ɓi kìɓan kiǹ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Kìɓan kiǹ ki kɛɓtii mìni fìɓàg?
I ɓì ki ghɛɛ Man à mum di a ɓɔɓɔg aɗyoo jàŋ inɛ à ka ɓaghà, ki ɓa min la?
Ǹghay wɛɛ̀ fafa cɛɓ, mɛ̀mùù mɛ yin ɗi gɛɓsɛ̀n. Fɔɔnnɛ ɓìɓan ɓi màa kpaa mìni ɓi ri ɓìɓan ɓi Nghay, rì ɓi cɛɓ.
Kìɓan kifog, ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn ɓɛ gherɛɛ ɓi. Lɛ a rìtumɛ̀n Yeesus à yighà ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓi, rì roànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà nyi kìkàɓi.
Fɔɔnnɛ à kpaaghà lɛ: Kìɓan ki kɛɛ̀ki ǹkpaaghà mìni miì lɛ mum à yin lɛ à yù a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ di Tààta à faa ɓi nyi fèg ànɛ̀n.
À tumɛ̀n ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ, ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ghaaghràkà, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti ti nyi.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà min ɓɛyilàg ɓɛ kiǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀rɛn lɛ: Mìnii kɔni ɓi lɛ ɓi ghaàrag girig?
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà nyi lɛ: Kan, tì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ ghɛn? Ù rì rì ɓìɓan ɓi cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ tì mɛ gherɛ̀n, tì ki yi lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri roànɛ à rì ǹtenɛn ànɛ à ɓaghày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll.
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nti mɛ̀ yɛɛ ɓɔngà mìni ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ntɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀? Ǹsoò fɔlɔɔ, kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ri Satàn.
Zyudas à man à Simɔn Iskariyot innɛ à kpaakpààghà lɔɔ lɛ nnyɛɛ ɓaghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ , ki ki ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà nyi kì kàɓi.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, Yeesus à rerènìghà ziì Galile lɛ à kɔ̀ngà ɓi lɛ a kɛǹ kì kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ a Zyude, lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kaakààghà lɛ ɓɛɛ wey nyi.
Tìcàɓ ti Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ti lɛ tìcàɓ ti ɓilaa  ti ɓaghà di ti ti jàŋbog.
Nni ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Pɛ̀sɛn fɛ, u kɛǹ a Zyude, di Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɔɔ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ girig ɓìɓan ɓi u kìki fɛ.
Mum à yin lɛ à kìkì ɓìɓan a rìnyam di a kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓɛɛ yi nyi. Nni yɛ̀ɛ u kìki ɓiɓan yɛ̀ɛ ɓi, kpaŋzi ɓyɔ mum bimiɗ a yi wɔ̀.
Lɛ nsoò ɓɛ̀geni ɓii ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓi nyi.
Yeesus à kalì ɓɔ lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n kɛm̀ ki ka kpaŋ ɓi, mìni yɛɛ ri rì syeesyee à cààmɛ̀n ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm.
Ziinɛ ì yin lɛ ì ɓèèzɛ̀n mìni wɔ̀lɛ mɛ̀ɛnɛ yɛɛ̀ ɓèeɓeèzɛ̀n, lɛ ǹti ǹkalàg lɛ, mɛ̀kìkii mɛ yɔ̀ mɛ rɔɔtɛɛ ɓì.
Mìnii ɓɔɔghna ɓi kɛǹ tìcàɓ, ɓi san wɛ̀m, mɛ̀ ǹka yin ɓiì ɓɔɓɔɔgh wɔɔ lɛ, cààmɛ̀n kɛm̀ ki ka ghɛɛ̀sɛn ɓi.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà ɓɔ fɔlɔɔ, nni à rɔ̀ɓkà a Galile.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀geni ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ ɓɔg a tìcàɓ, nni nyimiɗ a ɓɔkà girig wɔɔ, wɔ̀lɛ à ɓɔkà ɓi ɓi mɛ̀tàna, lɔŋ a rìnyam nnɛ à ɓɔkà.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kaakààghà nyi ɓi cààmɛ̀n à tìcàɓ di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ: À rì fe?
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi gwìy ìnɛn ɓɛ rurùmìghà lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi kìɓan kii. Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ lɛ: À rì syeesyee à mum; ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog lɛ: Àg! A nàanaàzì gì kɔm̀ ɓum bee.
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ, mum à ghɛɛsìghà ɓi lɛ a ɓuŋ nyi fɛlɛ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ ɓum lɛ ɓɛ rirìsìghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.
Yɛ̀ɛ tìcàɓ ti ɓaghà di ti ti ɓi nyìinyìm, Yeesus à ɗiŋìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, à tum rìrèsàg ɗi ɓum.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kuùkùùghràkà ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Ki ɓaa la lɛ, a yi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi ri ɓìkànɛ̀n, kɛ̀ɛ̀fɛ à yilaagh ɓyɔ?
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓìɓan ɓi nɗèeresàg ɓi, ɓi yin ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓi mɛ̀ɛmiɗ, ɓi ri lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Ŋwaànɛ à kɔ̀ni lɛ a ki rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ ri ɓiì yiì ǹkòo ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi nɗèrèsì, nkòo ɓiŋkɛ̀m ɓi mɛ̀ɛmiɗ.
Ŋwaànɛ a kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓii ɓi nyimiɗ yɛɛ̀ kaakaa rikem ɗii, wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ a kaakaa rikem ɗi roànɛ à romgày nyi, nnyɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa saaɗ, kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓa ri kìɓan kidɛŋ ki ki ri kìtɛ̀ŋtɛ̀ŋ.
Mɛ̀ɛ nti Moyis à faghà mìni ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna kìɓan kifog, nsoò wààdɛŋ ù ɓèŋi ɓi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓiǹ; nni ɓi kaakaa lɛ ɓi wey mɛ̀ lɛ cɛ?
Nni gwìy ì ɓum ì ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ù rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay; ghɛn yɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ a wey wɔ̀?
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkìi lɔŋ kiɓan kifog, kɛɛ ǹkegsii mìni lɛ ɓɛ̀sɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Ɓì ti ɓì kɛ̀ɗkì mum ŋwosi Saɓàt lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Moyis yɛɛ faghà mìni ìtèɗ ɓisuu kɛ̀rɛ̀n; nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ki yin lɛ Moyis yɛɛ kpagày rì nyi, lɔŋ ɓɛ̀seŋi ɓin ɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓɛɛ lokà kì kpaŋìì rì nyi.
I ɓì rì lɛ ɓì kɛ̀ɗ ŋwɔɓti ŋwosi Saɓàt, fɔlɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ ki yogsi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, nni lannɛ ɓi woki bim ri mɛ̀ lɛ mɛ̀ɛ ǹwɔ̀ɔ̀zii mum lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ŋwosi Saɓàt?
Kɛ̀ ɓi teki ɓiɓan ɗyoo rì ɗyoo, ɓàkiina kìɓan yɛ̀ɛ saaɗ a kɔ̀nkɔ̀n.
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a Yorisalɛm ɓɛ kpaakpààghà lɛ àa ŋwaànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ kaakaa lɛ ɓɛɛ wey yɛɛ ri lɛ?
Nni ghɛɛna min yɛ̀ɛ a tòtog lɛ fwàafwàày ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki kpaa nyi com. Ɓɛ̀làmì ɓis ɓɛ mɛ konag nya kì yiì lɛ nnyɛɛ ri Kiris gìn?
Ɓìsii yii jàŋ inɛ ŋwaànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì, wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à ri yù mum àa yi ɓi fennɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì.

Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à rèrèsàkà ɓum fɔlɔɔ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, nni à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ɓì yii mɛ̀, ɓì ki yi fennɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì; kɔm̀ lɛ m̀pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày ɓi ri nto wɛ̀m, kìɓan kifog roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ yɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa saaɗ, nyi nnɛ ɓì yii ɓi.
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii nyi lɛ ǹɗì fɛ ɓisu wii, rì tì lɛ, nnyɛɛ romgày mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kaakààghà bee inɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ nyi, kìɓan kifog mum à ki saghìghà ɓi nyi càg ɓi nyoo, ɓisuulɛ, cààmɛ̀n kii ki ɓaghà di ki ka kpaŋ ɓi.
Ɓi gwìy ìnɛn, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ Kiris à ri yù, à ri kì nya dàm yi yi cee yi ŋwaànɛ a kìkì?
Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ wokà yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ŋwɔŋwɔ̀ŋìghà fɔlɔɔ ɓi kìɓan kii; nni ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ romgà ɓɛ̀sujàà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ nyi.
Yeesus à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹkaka tì rì mìni ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ min yɛ̀ɛ roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kaà, kɛ̀ ɓi ghɛn mɛ, lɛ ɓì yin lɛ ɓì kpaŋ jàŋ inɛ m̀ɓiì ɓaà.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔɔghrɛ̀ngà ɓɔmiɗ lɛ: Fennɛ àrì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ ɓi ɗi lɛ tyɛ̀ ki ghɛn nyi? A kɛ̀n nya a Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀sààtɛn ɓi bàn yi Gìrɛg, à rèèrèsàg ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri Gìrɛg wɔɔ giǹ?
Jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ à kpaa lɛ: Ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kaà, ɓyɛ̀ ki ghɛn mɛ; rì ìnɛ lɛ: Jàŋ inɛ ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì kpaŋ wɔɔ, yi ri azi lɛ cɛ?
Ɓi ŋwos a siitòn, ànɛ à ɓaghà gɛn à ŋwos a tìcàɓ tiǹ, Yeesus à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à làmɓɛ̀n lɛ: I mum a wowog kinɔli, a yu a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, a nɔ.
Ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, mɛ̀syòm mɛ mɛnig mɛ cɛɓ mɛ ri nyi ɓiì ɓɛ̀nɓɛniì ɓi nɗem fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn.

Kìɓan ki Nghay ànɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛɛ nyi ɓɛ ghɛɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kìterì kɛɛ̀ki à kpaakpààghà lɔɔ. Ɓisuulɛ cààmɛ̀n kiǹ ki ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka rom yi ɓi Nghay, rì tì lɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di à ka teɗ ɓi rìkem ɗìì.
Ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓaghà lɛ, ɓɛ mɛ wog ɓitòkì ɓiǹ, nni ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ lɛ ŋwaànɛ yɛɛ ri ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: À rì Kiris, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Kiris à rì lɛ à ɓay a Galile?
Mɛ̀kànì mɛɛ̀ kpaaghi lɛ Kiris à rì ɓiì ɓaà yì ɓi boo ì mum ì Davit, ɓi bàn ì Bɛtilɛhɛm, jàŋ inɛ Davit à yalɛ̀ngà.
Nni ɓum ɓɛ rɔɓkà fɔlɔɔ, mɛ̀rɛli dɛŋ dɛ̀ŋ dɛŋ ɓi kìɓan kii.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓumɓɛ̀n, ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ fèkà lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ nyi, kìɓan kifog mum à saghìghà ɓi nyi càg ɓi nyòò.
Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ sugtìghà a Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì a Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ̀n ɓɛ tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yùu yì ɓi ri nyi lɛ cɛ?
Ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Mum à ka tokàkà ɓi yɛ̀ɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ pɛɛ̀zìghà ɓɛ̀sujàà ɓɛǹ lɛ: Mìni girig ɓyàa càrɛɛ lɛ a yegsi mìni wa?
Mìnii mɛ ghɛn nya di ǹlàmì àdɛŋ, nsoò lɛ Fàrìzyɛŋ àdɛŋ à gherɛɛ nyi?
Mìni ɓumɓɛ ɓi gwìy ìnɛ ì yii ɓi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓi Moyis, ɓì rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀cɛ̀mɛn.
Nikodɛm ànɛ à kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀ Yeesus à ɓaghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ̀n, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ:
Ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓis, ɓɛ ri nya lɛ ɓɛ ren kìɓan ki mum di ɓɛ ka wog ɓi nkpaà wii, ɓɛ ki yi kiɓan ki à kìi?
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ɔ̀ rì nya girig ŋwaànɛ a Galile? I ù konaagh kì kaà, ù ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ lɛ, Ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan a ka ɓaghày ɓi a Galile. [
Nni ɓɛ sukàkà a ɓɛ̀mɛɛ ɓaa.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà ɓi dòn ì ɓɛ̀òlìvyee.
Wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ duri i tangà, à sugtìghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ yu nyi a nyòò. Fɔɔnnɛ à kɔ̀rìghà ɓi zi à tumɛ̀n ɓɔ rìrèsàg.
Nni Ɓɛ̀rèsàg-ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ yughày nyi rì giɓ anɛ ɓɛ siìdìghà di a kìki fisɔ̀mɔ̀g,
ɓɛ kɔɔ̀sì nyi ɓi nyìinyìm à ɓum, ɓɛ kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg, ɓaa sììdii giɓ anɛ di a kìki fisɔ̀mɔ̀g.
Moyis à siitàkà ɓìsi ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna lɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì welì mɛ̀kuu mɛ ɓɛ̀yiɓ mɛ fɛlɛ, di tì rogii mɔ gɔ̀g, nni wɔ̀ɔ̀ kpaa la?
Ɓɛ kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ, ɓɛ ranɗàmgà Yeesus di ɓɛɛ ɓa rì bee inɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ sɔmɛn nyi. Wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à tuŋìghà à tumɛ̀n rìkàn ɓi zi ri manàcàg.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ kɛnkɛ̀ngà asu rì mɛ̀tɔɔ̀ghtɔɔgh, nni Yeesus à pɛ̀sìghà ǹto, à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ki ka kighà ɓi kiɓe, kɛɛ log nyi kì roŋì gɔ̀g.
Fɔɔnnɛ à sugtìghà kìtuŋii, à tumɛ̀n tì rìkànkàn ɓi zi.
Yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ wokà fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ tum rìghaghààgh lɛ bog bòg bog à tumɛ̀n ɓi ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, à kpaŋ ɓi ɓɛ siitòn. Nni Yeesus à cɛɛnɛ̀ngà foo ɓɛɛ̀ giɓ anɛ à ɓaghà ànɛn ɓi nyìinyìm.
Yeesus à pɛ̀sìtì min nto, à tɔg nyi lɛ: Giɓ anɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓaa yùu wɔ̀ kìsɔmɛɛ ɓɛ ti fe? Ŋwaà faa ɓi wɔ zɔɔ?
Giɓ a ɓàg lɛ: Mum à faa ɓi mɛ zɔɔ Kan. Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà min nyi lɛ: Nsoò mɛ̀ girig ǹfaa ɓi wɔ zɔɔ; kɛ̀na, kìɓan kifog kɔ̀ɔ kìti kiɓe yaà.]
Yeesus à tòòghrɛ̀ngà tì rì ɓɔ à kpaa lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì kìtɛɛtɛn ki ɓi ziinɛ; ŋwaànɛ à nɔ̀ɔ̀tii mɛ̀, àa kɛ̀ɛ̀ghi ɓi ɓi birìm, à rì lɔŋ ɓiì ɓaà rì kìtɛɛtɛn ki cɛɓ.
Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Wɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛɛ̀ rèresi kiɓan kɔɔ, fɔɔnnɛ com ki u kpaakpaa ki yin saaɗ.

Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ki soo rì lɛ mɛ̀ yɛɛ̀ rèresi kiɓan kɛm̀ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ, com ki nkpaakpàà ki ri saaɗ, lɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yii fe nnɛ nkɛ̀nkɛ̀n, kìɓan kifog, mìnii yii ɓi jàŋ inɛ m̀ɓaghày, nsoò jàŋ inɛ nkɛ̀nkɛ̀n.
Mìnii ti ɓì fiɓɓàg ɓìɓan ri ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗi ɓi mɛ̀mùù, ɓi ɓɛg wɛ̀m, mɛ̀ ǹ-yɔ̀mi ɓi mum.
Nsoò màa ki yɔ̀mi, rìren ɗyɛ̀m ɗi kiɓan ɗi ri lɛ saaɗ ɓisuulɛ ǹ-yin cɛ̀ncɛm, tì rì ɓɛɛ̀ Tààta ànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Ki ri kìkànɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓin lɛ: Rìtɛɛ̀zì ɗi kiɓan ɗi ɓum ɓɛɓɛɛ̀ ɗi ri saaɗ.
Mɛ̀ɛ nɗèresi saaɗ ànɛ ɓi kìɓan kɛm̀ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ, fɔɔnnɛ Tààta ànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ a rèresi kiɓan kɛm̀.
Nni ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ Soŋi à rì fe? Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yii ɓi mɛ, ɓyɛ̀ ɓi ki yi Seŋi wɛ̀m, i ɓyàa yii mɛ̀, di ɓì rì lɛ ɓì yi girig Seŋi wɛ̀m.
Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ yɛ̀ɛ à rèrèsàkà ɓum ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll, ɓi jàŋ inɛ ɓɛ ǹnyamgì ìkum; mum kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓan nyi, lɛ cààmɛ̀n kii ki ɓaghà di ki ka kpaŋ ɓi.
Yeesus à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nkɛ̀nkɛ̀n, ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kaà, ɓì ki wu ɓi kìɓe kin ɓiɗùm. Ɓì yin lɛ ɓì kpaŋ jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Àrì ɓiì wolɛɛ nyimiɗ giǹ, yɛ̀ɛ a kpaaghi lɛ: Ɓì yin lɛ ɓì kpaŋ jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ?
Nni Yeesus à kalìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mìnii pɛsɛɛ wɔɔ fɛ ɓi ziinɛ, mɛ̀ m̀pɛ̀sɛɛ yì aɗyòò; mìnii ri ɓumɓɛ ɓi ziinɛ, mɛ̀ ǹ-yin ŋwaànɛ ɓi ziinɛ.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ màa kpaa mìni lɛ, ɓì ɓiì wiì ɓi ɓìɓe ɓin ɓiɗùm; lɛ i ɓì gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ Mɛ̀ nɗì... , di ɓì wii ɓi ɓìɓe ɓin ɓiɗùm.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Ù rì ghɛn? Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹɗì roànɛ ǹkpaaghà mìni lɛ ǹɗì a rìtumɛ̀n.
Ǹtèghɛɛ ɓìɓan ɓi kpaakpaayɛn, rì ɓi yɔ̀mɛn ɓi kìɓan kin, kìɓan kifog roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀, a kpaakpaa saaɗ, fɔɔnnɛ nkpaakpaa ziinɛ ɓìɓan ɓi ǹwokà rì nyi.
Ɓɛ wokà ɓi lɛ kìɓan ki Seŋi kɛɛ̀ki à kpaakpààghà ɓɔ.

Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà min ɓɔ lɛ: Yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ri pɛ̀si Man à mum aɗyoo, lɛ teŋtèŋ̀ŋ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ri yi min lɛ Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri, rì tì lɛ mɛ̀ ǹ-yin ɓiì kìkii kiɓan kidɛŋ rì nto wɛ̀m, kìɓan kifog, mɛ̀ɛ nkpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi Seŋi wɛ̀m à rèsàkà mɛ̀.
Roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀ à rì nɗaŋ ri mɛ̀, à càɗkà ɓi mɛ cɛ̀ncɛm ɓisuulɛ, ǹti ǹkìlàg ɓìɓan ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi nyi ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaakpààghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi lɛ: I ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tii ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ kɛ̀ ɓi pas, ɓì rì ɓiì ɓaà ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛyilàg ɓɛm.
Ɓì rì ɓiì yiì saaɗ, saaɗ ànɛ̀n à ghaasì mìni ɓɛ̀kan.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Tì rì boo ì mum yì Abiraham, tì ka ɓaghà ɓi ɓɛkpàn ɓɛ mum. Nni lannɛ ù kpaa lɛ ɓì rì ɓiì ɓaà ɓɛ̀kan?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ, mum ǹcèm ànɛ a kìki kiɓe, à rì ǹkpàn a kìɓe.
Ǹkpàn a maà ɓa ɓi lɔŋ ŋwaànɛ ɓi naa ì ɓum ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, kìɓan kifog man ànɛ ɓi naa ì ɓum ìnɛ̀n, nnyɛɛ ri ŋwaànɛ ɓi naa ìnɛ̀n ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm.
Fɔɔnnɛ i Man yɛɛ ghaasii mìni ɓɛ̀kan, ɓì ɓa ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓɛ̀kan.
Ǹ-yii lɛ, ɓì rì boo ì mum yì Abiraham, kìɓan kifog, ɓi kaakaa lɛ ɓi wey mɛ̀ lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓi ghɛɛ ɓi ikɔ̀ɔ̀ ɓi mɛ̀rem min.
Mɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi ǹghɛngà yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m; mìniì yɛɛ̀ kìki lɔŋ ɓiɓan ɓi seŋi wìn à kpaaghà mìni.
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Abiraham yɛɛ ri seŋi wìs. Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: I ki ri saaɗ lɛ ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ Abiraham, kìina min ɓiɓan ɓi nyii kighà.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, ɓi kaakaa lɛ ɓi wey mɛ̀. M̀òànɛ ǹkpaaghà mìni ɓìɓan ɓi ǹwokày rì Bɛ̀ll, com ki Abiraham à kìghà ɓi.
Ɓi kìki ɓiɓan ɓi seŋi wìn a kìlàg? Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Tì yin ɓɔn ɓɛ tìsɔ̀mɔ̀g, tì rì lɔŋ Seŋi bog lɛ Bɛ̀ll.
Yeesus à kpaa lɛ: I kaa rì saaɗ lɛ Bɛ̀ll yɛɛ ri Seŋi wìn, di ɓì keesii mɛ̀; lɛ ɓi Bɛ̀ll nnɛ ǹfuu yì, wɔɔ nnɛ ǹki ɓaghày; ǹ-yùghày ɓi ri nto wɛ̀m, lɔŋ nyi yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀.
Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓì woogh ɓi kitòkì kɛm̀? Lɛ ɓì yin lɛ ɓì wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m.

Satàn yɛɛ ri seŋi wìn fɔɔnnɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ di ɓyàa kìi rìkɔ̀n ɗi seŋi wìn. A ɓalag ǹwolì-ɓum à tumɛ̀n a rìtumɛ̀n, à ki ka rɛlìghà ɓi ɓi saaɗ nsoò ŋwos bog, ɓisuulɛ, saaɗ a maà ɓa ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkii; cààmɛ̀n ki a pwààpwaa ɓum, lɔŋ com ki ki riì nyi ɓi nɗem kɛɛ̀ki a kpaakpaa ɓɔ, lɛ à rì pwààpwaà, à ki ɓa ti seŋi ɓɛ̀pwàà.
Ɓì gherɛɛ ɓi mɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ nkpaakpaa saaɗ.
Ghɛn anɛ ɓi mìni yɛɛ ri lɛ à rèsì nsoò maa rìnàn ɓi cɛɓ kɛ̀m lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n? I mɛ̀ ǹki kpaa saaɗ, ɓi cɛ nnɛ ɓì gherɛɛ ɓi mɛ?
Ŋwaànɛ àrì mum à Bɛ̀ll, a woki jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll; nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yin ɓum ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll, nnɛ ɓì woogh ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Ki ri lɔŋ saaɗ yɛ̀ɛ tìi nkpaa lɛ, ù rì ŋwaànɛ a Samari, ù ki ɓa ti ri kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay.
Yeesus à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì lɛ: Ǹ-yin ɗi kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, kìɓan kifog nkeekem̀zì Seŋi wɛ̀m, mìnii ki sòosoòtì mɛ̀.
Mɛ̀ n-yin ɓiì kaakaa rikem ɗyɛ̀m, ŋwaàdɛŋ yɛɛ̀ kaakaa ɗyɔ, nnyɛɛ̀ ki yɔ̀myɔm ɓum.
Ǹkalii mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkalì lɛ: I ŋwaà ɓèŋi ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀, ŋwaànɛ̀n à wii gɛ ɓi.

Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ tì yii lɛ ù rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay. Abiraham à wughà, ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ cuu girig, wɔ̀ɔ̀ ki kpaa lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à ɓèŋi ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀ à wii gɛ ɓi.
Wɔ̀ yɛɛ cee Abiraham à seŋi wìs anɛ à wughà? Rì ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan ɓɛ ɓɛ cuughà girig? Wɔ̀ɔ fèfeg lɛ ù rì cɛ?
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà lɛ: I màa ɓɔɔ̀ɓɔ̀gsɛ̀n di rìkem ɗyɛ̀m ɗi ri ɗi zɛy rì zɛy. Nni Seŋi wɛ̀m ànɛ ɓi kalag lɛ à rì Bɛ̀ll wìn yɛɛ̀ ɓɔɔɓɔgsì mɛ̀.
Ɓì ki yii ɓi nyi; mɛ̀ ǹ-yii nyi. I ǹkpaa lɛ ǹ-yii ɓi nyi, di ǹɗì pwààpwaà yɛ̀ɛ mìni. Kiɓan kifog mɛ̀ ǹ-yii nyi, mɛ̀ɛ ǹki ɓèŋɓeŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì.
Abiraham à seŋi wìn a nyààrɛ̀ngà rì fèg ànɛ lɛ, à ɓiì ghɛɛ ŋwos wɛm̀, à ki ghɛngà nyi à wog kìrɔɔ lɛɛ̀gwey.
Nni Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìkpaŋì bèg mɛ̀tin mɛɓɛɛ̀ rì ǹtɛ̀ɗ, ù ki kpaa lɛ ù ghɛngà Abiraham?
Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹkpaa mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ, di Abiraham à ka yin, mɛ̀ m̀ɓaghà.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ pɛsàkà gɔ̀g lɛ ɓɛɛ rogi nyi, wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à nyamzɛ̀ngà à kpaŋ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghaghàghìyà, nni à ghɛngà ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà rì tìɗyaŋ.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Raɓì, ŋwaànɛ à yalɛ̀ngà fɛlɛ rì tìɗyaŋ lɛ nyimiɗ yɛɛ kighà kìɓe gìn ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii?
Yeesus à ɓàg lɛ: Ki yin lɛ nyimiɗ, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛɛ kighà kìɓe, wɔ̀lɛ ki ri lɔŋ fɔlɔɔ lɛ, di mɛ̀kìkìì mɛ Bɛ̀ll mɛɛ ghɛnɛn a lɔ̀ŋkii.
Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ti ki ɓìsay ɓi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀, di ŋwos a kaka, lɛ ìru wɛɛ̀ yùyuiy, wɛɛ̀wu mum àa ɓa ti ɓi ri bee inɛ à kì kìsay miì.
Cààmɛ̀n ki ǹkaka ɓi ziinɛ, ǹɗì kìtɛɛtɛn ki ɓi ziinɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à tuughà tìtyɛɛ̀ ɓi zi, à kì kìtɔ̀tɔ̀ɓ rì tìtyɛɛ̀ tii, à siŋì ŋwaànɛ̀n ɓi mis,
à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kɛ̀na kìsòo ìsu ɓi kìɗig ki a Silowe; ɗii ɗìn ɗi ri azi lɛ: Ǹɗomɛn. Nni ɗyaŋɗyàŋ à kɛ̀ngà, à sòò ìsu, à sugtìì di à mɛ ghɛnɛ̀n.
Ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ woŋzɛ̀ngà mɛɛ ri ɓɔ, rì ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛ nghɛngì nyi abɛ̀y di a lɔnlɔn ɓyom ɓi bee, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Àa ŋwaànɛ yɛɛ nti à kɔ̀ràg fɛ à lɔnlɔ̀n ɓum ɓyom?
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ nnyɛɛ ri, ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog lɛ àg! Àa nyi yɛɛ ri, lɔŋ kìpisɛn kii kɛɛ ri. Wɔ̀lɛ nyimiɗ a ki kpaakpaa lɛ: Lɔŋ mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà min nyi lɛ: Mis mɔɔ maa ghɛnɛɛ di ki ɓaa là?
Nni à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ ɓɛɛ̀ regi lɛ Yeesus yaa tɔɓi zi, à siŋì mɛ̀ ɓi mis, à kpaa mɛ̀ lɛ: Kɛ̀na kì sòo ìsu ɓi Silowe. Fɔɔnnɛ màa kɛ̀ɛ, ǹsòò ìsu, ǹghɛnɛ̀n.
Nni ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Ŋwaà ǹcèm à rì fe? Nyii pɛɛ̀zì lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ɓi.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛǹgà rì ŋwaànɛ à ka ɓaghà rì tìɗyaŋ ànɛ̀n a Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ.
Kɔɔ ki ɓaghà foo lɛ, ŋwosi Saɓàt nnɛ Yeesus à tɔɓkà zi, à kì lɛ, mis mɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n mɛɛ ghɛnɛn.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ tɔkà girig ŋwaànɛ̀n lɛ, a kali ɓɔ lannɛ kaa kìlɛɛ lɛ a ghɛnɛn. Nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Àa siŋii mɛ̀ kìtɔ̀tɔ̀ɓ ɓi mis, ǹsòò ìsu, nnɛ nghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n lɛ.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ kpaaghà lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì ɓi yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓisuulɛ à cèlii ɓi Saɓàt. Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ tɔg lɛ: Lannɛ ǹkìì-kìɓe a rì lɛ à kì mɛ̀kuu mɛ dàm yɛ̀ɛ mɛ?

Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ ghasɛ̀ngà gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀; ɓɛ tɔgtì ɗyaŋɗyàŋ ànɛ̀n lɛ: Ɓi ɓɛg wɔ̀ɔ̀, wɔ̀ɔ̀ kpaa la ɓi kìɓan ki ŋwaànɛ àa kìi lɛ mis mɔɔ mɛɛ ghɛnɛn? Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à pɛ̀ɛ̀zìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹghɛɛ lɛ à rì ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓi lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à ka ɓaghà rì tìɗyaŋ nni à mɛ ghɛnɛ̀n, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ ka reŋii ɓi ɓɛyalì ɓii.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tɔkà ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii lɛ: Man wiǹ ànɛ ɓi kpaaghi lɛ à yalɛ̀ngà rì tìɗyaŋ yɛɛ ri lɛ? Nni lannɛ à ti ɓiì ghɛnɛɛghɛnɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ?
Ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛ ɓaàg lɛ: Ɓìsii yii lɛ man wìs yɛɛ ri lɛ, à ki yalɛ̀ngà rì tìɗyaŋ.
Kìɓan kifog, tì yii ɓi com ki ki kiì lɛ a ghɛnɛn, tyɛ̀ ki ki yi nsoò ŋwaànɛ àa ŋwàri nyi mis. Tɔɔghna nyi, à ti ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn ɓi lèg ànɛ lɛ à ɓàg kìɓan ki ki seesee nyi.

Ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛ kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ, ɓɛ rirìsìghà Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n; rì tì lɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓaghà di ɓɛ mɛ wooghrɛn jɛ̀ɛ̀ lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ lɛ Yeesus à rì Kiris, ɓɛ ren nyi ɗii ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓɛ̀yalì ɓii ɓɛɛ kpaa lɛ: À ti ǹsɛ̀ɛ̀mɛn, tɔɔghna nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ reŋìghày tì ŋwaànɛ à ka ɓaghà ànɛ̀n rì tìɗyaŋ, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Kali saaɗ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓìsii yii lɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à rì ǹkìì-kìɓe.
Nni ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàkà lɛ: Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ɓi nkòo à rì ǹkìì-kìɓe; com ki mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ki ri lɛ, m̀ɓalag ri tìɗyaŋ, nni m̀mɛ ghɛnɛn ɓigomìnɛ.
Ɓɛ tɔkà nyi lɛ: Cɛ kɛɛ̀ ki àa kìi wɔ̀? Lannɛ àa kìi lɛ mis mɔɔ mɛɛ ghɛnɛ̀n?
À ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Màa kpaa mìni kìɓan ki, kɛ̀ ɓi kɔ̀n lɛ ɓi wog. Ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ɓi wogti kɔ? Ɓi kɔ̀nkɔn girig lɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii?
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ sɛmgàkà ŋwaànɛ̀n, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri ǹ-yilàg wìì, ɓìsii ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Moyis.
Tì yii lɛ, Bɛ̀ll à tòòghrɛ̀ngà rì Moyis; wɔ̀lɛ roànɛ, tì yii ɓi fennɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì.
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Kìɓan ki ki yeesɛɛ rìwog ki ri lɛ, mìnii yii ɓi fennɛ à pɛ̀sɛɛ yì, wɔ̀lɛ nyaa ki ŋwàri mɛ̀ mis!
Tì yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à ti kɛ̀ɛ wog bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi ɓɛ̀kìì-kìɓe, kìɓan kifog, à ti à wokì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yi ŋwaànɛ à kuuraagh nyi, à ki kìlag rikɔ̀n ɗii.
Tì ka wokà ɓi di ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa lɛ, ŋwaàdɛŋ à mɛ kìghà lɛ mis mɛ ŋwaànɛ à yalɛɛ rì tìɗyaŋ mɛɛ ghɛnɛ̀n.
I ŋwaànɛ kɛ̀ɛ ɓay yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, di à yin lɛ à kì com.
Nni ɓɛ ɓakà nyi lɛ: Wàànɛ ù yalɛ̀ngà ɓi kìɓe wɛ̀ɛmiɗ bimiɗ, wɔ̀ yɛɛ̀ kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ u resag ɓìsi? Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ naɓkà nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà lɛ, ɓɛ nnàɓi ŋwaànɛ̀n, nni à tuusɛ̀ngà rì nyi, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù gherɛɛ nya Man à mum?
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à pɛ̀ɛ̀zì nyi lɛ: Nnyɛɛ ri ghɛn Kan, yɛ̀ɛ ǹɗì lɛ ǹgherɛ̀n nyi?
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ù mɛ ghɛn ancèm, nyimiɗ yɛɛ̀ ki tòtog lɛ rì wɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ ŋwaànɛ̀n à kpaaghà lɛ: Kan ǹgherɛɛ; à ɓag mɛ̀ɗu ɓi zi, à ɓɔgsì nyi.
Yeesus à kalì min nyi lɛ: Ǹ-yùghà ɓi ziinɛ lɛ rìren ɗi ɓìɓan ɗyɛɛ ghɛnɛn lèg ànɛ lɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri rì tìɗyaŋ ɓɛɛ ghɛnɛn, ɓɛ̀roɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n ɓɛ ɗiŋì tìɗyaŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà rì ɓɔ ɓɛ wokà ɓìtòkì ɓiǹ, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Ɓìsii ri nya girig rì tìɗyaŋ?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: I ɓyàa rì rì tìɗyaŋ, di ɓì yiǹ lɛ ɓì ɓa rì kìɓe; nni yɛ̀ɛ ɓi kpaakpaa lɛ ɓi ghɛɛghɛnɛ̀n, fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kìɓe kin ki kaka.
Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ ŋwaànɛ à fyee ɓi asuunaa lɛ a ɗiŋi ɓi kìlaa ki jɔ̀ɔ̀, kìɓan kifog à ɓɔg gari ɓi jàŋ idɛŋ à ɗinì ɓi kìlaa, à rì lɛ nyi wiiwìì, nyi tì zyaàzyaa.
Lɔŋ roànɛ à ɗiŋii asuunaa yɛɛ ri syeesyee à m̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ yiǹ.
M̀ɓèŋì-ìsuunaa à nɛm ŋwaànɛ̀n ìsuunaa lɛ a ɗiŋi, jɔ̀ɔ̀ yii yi wog jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì; à ki regi jɔ̀ɔ̀ yii lɔŋ ɓi mii, à kɛ̀n ɗì yɔ ɓidan.
I à mɛ kpaŋzi jɔ̀ɔ̀ yii yicèm, à syòŋ yɔ bee, yɔɔ nɔɔ̀nɔ̀ɔ̀tì nyi lɛ, yi yii jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì.
Yi yin lɛ yi nɔɔ̀tì ǹkèn a mum, kìɓan kifog yi ri ɓiì ghɛŋii nkèn a mum fìràɓ lɛ yi remzii ɓi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yi ɓɛ̀kèn.
Yeesus à tekà ɓɔ dàɗkì ìnɛn, kìɓan kifog ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ wog kiɓan ki a kpaaghà ɓɔ.
Nni Yeesus à kpaatìghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri ìsuunaa wu gari ì jɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ lokày kì yùu ri mɛ̀, ɓɛ ri, ɓɛ̀wiiwìì, rì ɓɛ̀zyaàzyaa. Wɔ̀lɛ jɔ̀ɔ̀ yi wokà ɓi rikpaa ɗyàà.
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri ìsuunaa, ŋwaànɛ à fyee a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ à ɗiŋì à ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ cɛɓ. À ɓiì kìi lɛ à ɗiŋì, à kpaŋ à ki tanɛn ɓiɗilàg.
Wiiwìì à ti à yùlàg lɔŋ lɛ, a yiì, à wey, à ki cuusi. Ɓi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ǹ-yùghà lɛ, jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ, yi ki ɓa ri kɔ lɛɛ̀gwey.
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri syeesyee à m̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀. Syeesyee à m̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀ a falag cɛɓ kii ɓisuu jɔ̀ɔ̀ yii.

Wɔ̀lɛ ŋwaànɛ a ɓèŋɓeŋ jɔ̀ɔ̀ lɛ ɓɛɛ leɓ nyi, kɛ̀ɛ ki ɓa mɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀, jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki ɓa lɛ yiŋkii, à ti à kìlàg lɛ, i à ghɛɛ ǹgɔn, à rinì jɔ̀ɔ̀, à làn. Ǹgɔn à yù kì ɓangii jɔ̀ɔ̀, à san yɔ.
Ŋwaànɛ̀n à ti à làngì fɔlɔɔ ɓisuulɛ, a kìki kisay ɓisuu mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, ǹɗem wii wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ kɛsi ri jɔ̀ɔ̀.
Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri syeesyee à m̀ɓèŋì-jɔ̀ɔ̀. Ǹ-yii jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀, jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀ yi ki yii mɛ̀,
lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à yii mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ǹki yi Tààta; mɛ̀ ǹki faa cɛɓ kɛ̀m ɓisuu jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀.
Ǹɗì tì rì jɔ̀ɔ̀ yidɛŋ yi yi ka yin ɓi kìlaa ki. Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ nteɗ yì girig yɔ; yi ri ɓiì woògh jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, fɔɔnnɛ kìtuu ki jɔ̀ɔ̀ ki ɓiì ɓaà kìfog, m̀ɓèŋì à ɓa bog.
Tààta à keesii mɛ̀ ɓisuulɛ, ǹfaa cɛɓ kɛ̀m lɛ di nki teeti kɔ.
Mum à ɓàtɛɛ ɓi mɛ cɛɓ, lɔŋ mɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛɛ faa kɔ̀. Ǹɗì rì ìtèɗ wulɛ nfa kɔ, ǹki ɓa ti ri ìtèɗ wulɛ ǹteetì kɔ̀; kìɓan ki Seŋi wɛ̀m à reɓsìghà mɛ̀ lɛ nki kɛɛ̀ kìn.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ghasɛ̀ngà tì gàɓ yiɓɛɛ̀ ɓisuu ɓitòkì ɓiǹ.
Kìgwey ki ɓi ɓɔ ki kpaakpààghà lɛ: Yeesus à rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay, à ki ɓa ti ndùŋɛn, ɓisuucɛ nnɛ ɓi wowog ɓiɓan ɓii?
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Ɓìtòkì ɓi ŋwaànɛ ɓi yin ɓitòkì ɓi ŋwaànɛ à rì rì kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay. Kìɓeɓtàg ki nghay ki ri nya lɛ ki ŋwaɗ mis mɛ ɓɛɗyaŋɗyaŋ?
Tìcàɓ ti gòn inɛ ɓɛ faghà naà-Bɛ̀ll rì Bɛ̀ll ti ɓaghà a Yorisalɛm, ki ɓaghà ɓi cààmɛ̀n à bùmà.
Nni Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀ghà ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll ɓi tuùtuu anɛ ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ, tuùtuu a Salomɔŋ.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: U kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ mɛ̀rem mɛɛ ɗiìɗìlɛ̀n ɓìsi ɓi mùm à kpaŋ ɓigomìbe? Nkòo wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri Kiris, kali ɓìsi lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n.
Nni Yeesus à ɓakà ɓɔ lɛ: M̀mɛ kpaa mini, kɛ̀ ɓi gherɛn. Ɓiɓan ɓi nkìki ɓi ɗii ɗi Seŋi wɛ̀m, ɓyɔ yɛɛ rèresi rikuu ɗi mum ɗi ǹɗì.
Kìɓan kifog, ɓì gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yin jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀.
Jɔ̀ɔ̀ yɛm̀ yi ti yi wokì jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, mɛ̀ ǹ-yii yɔ, yɔɔ ki ti yi nɔɔ̀tàg mɛ̀.
Ǹti ǹfalàg yɔ cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀, yàa wu ɓi nsoò ŋwos bog, mum à ki yin lɛ à ɓàtɛ̀n yɔ ɓi càg kɛm̀.
Seŋi wɛ̀m ànɛ à faghà mɛ̀ yɔ, à cee ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, fɔɔnnɛ mum à yin lɛ à ɓàtɛ̀n yɔ ɓi càg ki Tààta.
Rì mɛ̀ rì Tààta, tì rì lɔŋ mum bog.
Fɔɔnnɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓadɛ̀ngà tì gɔ̀g lɛ ɓɛɛ rogi nyi.
Nni Yeesus à kpaatìghà min ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nkìi ɓɛ̀gɛn ɓɛ ɓiɓan lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mis min, rì ìtèɗ wu Tààta, nni ɓi ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, kibe kɛɛ̀ki ɓì ti mɛ̀ ɓiì rogii gɔ̀g miì?

Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓag nyi lɛ: Tì yin lɛ tì rogì wɔ̀ gɔ̀g ɓi syeesyee à kìɓan anɛ ù kìi, wɔ̀lɛ tii rogì wɔ̀ gɔ̀g ɓisuu zɛɛtɛn yi ù rì rì yɔ ɓi san ànɛ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, ɓisuulɛ, wɛ̀ɛnɛ lɔŋ mum, ù ki kɔ̀n lɛ u terɛn wɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll?
Nni Yeesus à ɓàkà ɓɔ lɛ: Ki yin kikànɛn ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓin lɛ: Bɛ̀ll à kpaaghà lɛ ɓì rì bɛ̀ll ?
Tì yii lɛ mum à yin lɛ à pisì kìɓan ki ki ri kìkànɛn; nni i mɛ̀kànì mɛ regii ɓumɓɛ Bɛ̀ll à tòòghrɛ̀ngà rì ɓɔ lɛ bɛ̀ll,
mìnii kalì roànɛ Bɛ̀ll à ɓɔ̀ngà à rom yì lɛ à sɛɛtii Bɛ̀ll, ɓisuulɛ màa kalii lɛ, ǹɗì Man à Bɛ̀ll?
I ǹki rɔ̀ɓi kɛ̀ɛ nkì ɓisay ɓi Seŋi wɛ̀m, ɓì rɔ̀ɓ kɛ̀ ɓi gherɛn mɛ.
Kìɓan kifog, i nkìki ɓisay ɓii, nsoò ɓyàa gherɛɛ ɓi mɛ, gherɛɛna ɓyɔ, fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ɓiì kìi lɛ, ɓì yi, ɓì ki ghɛn lɛ Tààta à rì ɓi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ɓi Tààta.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ mɛɛ̀ kaatìghà bee inɛ ɓɛɛ ɓaǹ nyi; wɔ̀lɛ Yeesus à sɔtɛ̀n ɓɔ ɓi ɓyàg.
Nni Yeesus à kɛ̀ɛ̀dìghà cɛcɛɗ ki Zyuridɛŋ, ɓi jàŋ inɛ Zyaŋ à ka ɓààɓàɓtìghà ɓum, à kɔ̀rì wɔɔ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ yughày nyi a nyoo, ɓɛ kpaakpàà lɛ: Zyaŋ à kìghà ɓi dàm nsoò bog, kìɓan kifog, ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi Zyaŋ à kpaaghà à ràɗ ɗì ŋwaànɛ ɓi ɓaghà saaɗ.
Nni ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà Yeesus.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ ɗii lɛ Lazaari, yɛɛ roròɓkà; à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ a Bɛtanii, ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ ki ɓɛ-Marii ɓɛɛ̀ Maata à geni.
Marii ànɛn yɛɛ sisìŋìghà Kan tìrààre, à ki tɔ̀si nyi mɛ̀kòò ri tyòŋ tii; nni geni Marii à baŋì yɛɛ roròɓkà lɔɔ lɛ Lazaari.
Rìgeni ɗi ɓɛ̀yiɓ ɗiǹ, ɗi romgà mum lɛ a kali Yeesus lɛ: Kan, mum wɔɔ̀ ànɛ u keesàg, à yin cem.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à wokà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaaghà lɛ: Fìroɓ fìn fi yin nyi ɓiì wowoli, fi ri ɓisuu rikem ɗi Bɛ̀ll, lɛ Man à Bɛ̀ll a teɗ rìkem ɓi fìroɓ fìn.
Yeesus à keesìghà lɛ, rì Maata rì geni à giɓ, rì Lazaari girig.
Yɛ̀ɛ à wokà lɛ Lazaari à yin cem, à laatìghà mɛ̀ru mɛɓɛɛ̀ ɓi jàŋ inɛ à ɓaghà.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à kalìghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii lɛ: Ti sugtiina a Zyude.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ kpaa nyi lɛ: Raɓì, ki ka finɛn ɓi yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ m̀mɛɛ̀ rogi wɔ gɔ̀g, wɔ̀ɔ̀ ki kɔ̀ɔ̀di lɛ u sugti wɔɔ?
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Mɛ̀ɛ nti ŋwos a rìlàg ɓɛ̀hawò ǹtɛ̀ɗ rì ɓiɓɛɛ̀? I mum a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ri ŋwos, à yin lɛ à ɓàgtɛ̀n, ɓisuulɛ a seesee kitɛɛtɛn ki ɓi ziinɛ.
Wɔ̀lɛ i mum a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ri ìru, à rì lɛ à ɓàgtɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ à yin ɗi kìtɛɛtɛn ɓi nyimiɗ.
Yɛ̀ɛ à tòòghrɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Reŋkàŋ wìs Lazaari àa nlali, kìɓan kifog ǹɗì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ nyi kìghèmzii.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Kan i ki ri lɛ àa nlali di à ɓiì ɓaà lɛ syeesyee.
Rìwu ɗi Lazaari ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi à kpaaghà, wɔ̀lɛ ɓɔɔ fekì nya lɛ fìlo fi zɛy fyɛɛ̀fi à kpaa.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n lɛ: Lazaari à rì kìloŋ.
Nni kìnyàà ki ri mɛ̀ kìronɛn ɓi nɗem ɓisu win lɛ, mɛ̀ɛ ǹ-yin wɔɔ, fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ɓiì kìi lɛ ɓi gherɛn. Wɔ̀lɛ ti kɛ̀ɛna jàŋ inɛ à rì.
Fɔɔnnɛ Tomas ànɛ ɓɛ nɗegì lɛ, Didim , à kpaaghà ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛmbog lɛ: Ti kɛ̀ɛna girig, ti wu nɗaŋ ɗi nyi.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpagà wɔɔ, à tanɛ̀n di Lazaari à ti ɓi zɔ̀ŋ mɛ̀ru mɛnin.
Yɛ̀ɛ Bɛtanii à ɓaghà jàŋbog ɗì Yorisalɛm nunùg ɓɛ̀kilòmɛɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ ɓɛraa,
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ yughày yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ̀-Maata ɓɛɛ̀ Marii, lɛ ɓɛɛ fɔɔ̀si ɓɔ mɛ̀rem ɓi rìwu ɗi gèni wàà.
Yɛ̀ɛ Maata à wokà lɛ Yeesus à tiì, nni à kɛ̀ngà nyi kìɓoŋì ɓi bee, Marii nyii rɔɓkà lɔŋ ki kɔ̀kɔrii ɓi nàà.
Fɔɔnnɛ Maata à kpaaghà Yeesus lɛ: Kan, i wɔ̀ɔ nɗì fɛ, di gèni wɛ̀m àa yin lɛ à wu.
Kìɓan kifog, ǹ-yii lɛ nsoò ɓigomìnɛ, com kìcèm ki ù rì ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh Bɛ̀ll, à rì wɔ̀ kɔ ɓiì faà.
Yeesus à kpaa Maata lɛ: Goni à ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ.
Maata à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ǹ-yii lɛ à ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki ɓìloŋ ɓi ri ɓiì ghèmɓɛɛ, ɓi ŋwos a siitòn.
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri rìghèmɓɛ̀n ɗi ɓiloŋ, rì cɛɓ; ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, à ɓiì ɓaà rì cɛɓ nsoò àa wìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ a ghɛghɛ̀ɓ à ki gherɛn mɛ, àa wu ɓi; ù gherɛɛ nya kìɓan kiǹ?
Maata à ɓàg lɛ: Ɛ̀ɛ̀ Kan! ǹgherɛɛ lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ ri Kiris, Man à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà kì yùu ɓi ziinɛ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Maata à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à kɛ̀ngà kì reŋii geni à giɓ anɛ lɛ Marii, à kɔ̀ŋɗɛ̀n nyi a dwìɗ lɛ: Ǹɗèsàg à rì fɛ, a ki regi wɔ.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Marii à wokà fɔlɔɔ, à ghàs kì pɛ̀sɛɛ, à kɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus.
Lɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di à ka ɗiŋi ɓi ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ, à ɓaghà di à kaka jàŋ inɛ Maata à tulɛ̀ngà rì nyi.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi naa rì Marii ɓɛ fɔɔfɔ̀ɔ̀sì nyi nɗem, ɓɛ ghɛngà lɔŋ di à mɛ pɛ̀sɛn aɗyoo lɛ fòos, à kpaŋ ɓi ɗyɔ̀m; fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ nɔɔ̀tìghà nyi, ɓɛ fekì lɛ à kɛ̀ɛ kì rèni a zɔ̀ŋ.
Yɛ̀ɛ Marii à kpagà jàŋ inɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà, à ghɛn Yeesus, à kpì nyi a mɛ̀kòò, à kpaa nyi lɛ: Kan i wɔ̀ɔ nɗì fɛ, di geni wɛ̀m àa ŋwii ɓi.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ghɛngà di Marii a rènɗèn, Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghày ǹɗaŋ ri nyi ɓɛ renɗèn girig, nni nyìinyìg ì ɓangà nyi lɛɛ̀gwey, ǹɗem wu nyɛŋɗɛ̀n nyi ɓiɗùm,
à tɔg lɛ: Fe nnɛ ɓìi mɓòmi nyi? Ɓɛ ɓaàg nyi lɛ: Kan yuiy u ghɛǹ.
Nni Yeesus à rèngà.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ kpaa min lɛ: Ghɛɛna yɛ̀ɛ àa nti à keesàg nyi.
Gàɓ ìdɛŋ ìnɛ ɓi ɓɔ ì kpaa lɛ: Nyi ànɛ à ŋwàɗkà ɗyaŋɗyàŋ mis, àa yin lɛ à kì lɛ Lazaari kɛ̀ɛ wu?
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹɗem wu Yeesus wu nyɛŋɗɛ̀ngà tì ɓi ɗùm, à kɛ̀n a zɔ̀ŋ. Zɔ̀ŋ ìncèm ì ɓaghà ǹtuɓɛn ɓi gɔ̀g ɓɛ simì gɔ̀g ìdɛŋ a ŋwɔm.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà lɛ: Pisiina gɔ̀g ìnɛ ɓi ŋwɔm wu zɔ̀ŋ. Maata, a geni Lazaari ànɛ à wughà, à kpaa Yeesus lɛ: Kan, à ti ɓiì nùnnumi; lɛ mɛ̀ru mɛnin gɛɛ̀nɛ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛ mɓòmi nyi.
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Màa kpaa wɔ̀ lɛ i ù gherɛɛ ù ɓiì ghɛɛ rìgwey ɗi Bɛ̀ll!
Nni ɓɛ pisìghà gɔ̀g ìnɛn, Yeesus à ɓegsì mis aɗyoo, à kpaa lɛ: Tààta ǹtògsaagh wɔ̀ ɓisuulɛ, wàa ɓàagh bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛ̀m.
Ɓi ɓɛg wɛ̀m, ǹ-yii lɛ ù ti ù ɓàkì bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yɛm̀ ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, kìɓan kifog ǹkpaa fɔlɔɔ ɓisuu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ri fɛ, lɛ di ɓɛɛ gherɛn lɛ wɔ̀ yɛɛ romgày mɛ̀.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ, nni à pɛ̀sìghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo rì ìtèɗ à kpaa lɛ: Lazaari kpaŋay.
Fɔɔnnɛ kìloŋ ki kpagày, ɓyàg rì mɛ̀kòò ɓì kàgakɛn ri ɓɛ̀ɓanɗas, ìsu wù kàŋɛn ɗi sànjà. Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Fùmiina nyi, ɓi caɗ nyi a kɛǹ.
Kìgwey ki ɓi Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛ ɓɛ yuyùghà yɛ̀ɛ Marii, ɓɛ ghɛn kìɓan ki Yeesus à kìghà kiǹ, ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi.
Wɔ̀lɛ gàɓ ìdɛŋ ìnɛ ɓi ɓɔ ì kɛ̀ngà kì ghɛɛ̀ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ, ì kpaa ɓɔ kìɓan ki Yeesus à kìghà.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey rì Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ taŋzɛ̀ngà Sànèdìrɛŋ ɓɛ kpaa lɛ: Ti ki la? Lɛ ŋwaànɛ a kìki dàm lɛɛ̀gwey.
I tì càri nyi lɛ a kiki fɔlɔɔ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri ɓiì gherɛɛ nyi, à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Ɓɛ̀ròmɛŋ ɓɛ ɓiì yùu, ɓɛ yogsì lɛ rì naa yìs i Bɛ̀ll, rì kìlɔ̀ŋ kis.
Nni mum bog ànɛ ɓi ntaŋzɛn lɛ Kayif, ànɛ à ɓaghà ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓi bèg ìnɛn, à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yii ɓi lɔ̀ŋ com.
Ɓì ghɛɛ ɓi lɛ ki ri mìni kìrɔɔ lɛ mum bog a wu ɓisuu kilɔ̀ŋ di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ kìlɔ̀ŋ kìcèm kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɗyaŋ?

À kpaaghà ɓi fɔlɔɔ ɓi ɗyomzɛ̀n ɗii ɗi nyimiɗ, wɔ̀lɛ yɛ̀ɛ nnyɛɛ ɓaghà ǹlàmì-ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓi bèg ìnɛ̀n nnɛ à kalìghà kìɓan ki di ki kakay, lɛ Yeesus à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wiì ɓisuu kilɔ̀ŋ ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n.
Àa lɔŋ kìlɔ̀ŋ kiǹ kɔ rì kɔ, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ girig kì wiì lɛ a taŋzɛn ɓɔn ɓɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀sààtɛn, ɓɛɛ ɓa kìbyɔg kìfog.
À tumɛ̀n ŋwos anɛ̀n innɛ ɓɛ rengà lɛ ɓɛɛ wey Yeesus.

Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à casɛ̀ngà kɛ̀ɛ rèsɛn ti lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ɓi nyìinyìm à Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n. À pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà foo, à kɛ̀n ɓi kòdò àdɛŋ ànɛ à ɓaghà jàŋbog rì ìreɓ, ɓi bàn ìnɛ lɛ Efirayim, à kɔ̀rì wɔɔ ri ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii.
Paskà à Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n à ɓaghà di à ti jàŋbog; ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓi jɛ̀m yi ɓilɔ̀ŋ ɓɛ ɓɔkày a Yorisalɛm di Paskà à kakay ɓisuu zòghɛ̀n.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kaakààghà Yeesus, ɓɛ tɔɔ̀tɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ ɓi naà-Bɛ̀ll lɛ: Mìnii ghɛɛ lɛ à rì lɛ à yù tìcàɓ gìn, àa yù ɓi?
Yɛ̀ɛ Paskà à ɓaghà di à mɛ rɔ̀ɓ mɛru taàfog, Yeesus à kɛ̀ngà a Bɛtanii, jàŋ inɛ Lazaari ànɛ à ghèmzìghà ɓi zɔ̀ŋ à ɓaghà.
Ɓɛ lamgà nyi ɓìɗilàg wɔɔ, Maata à kàɓkì ɓum ɓyɔ̀. Lazaari à ɓaghà kìbog ki ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus.

Nni Marii à tekà coo ɓeŋ à tìrààre ti ti ɓaghà tì kɛŋɛn lɛɛ̀gwey; ti ɓaghà tì kìyɛn ɗi caaɓi kidɛŋ lɛ naàr, à sùùrì Yeesus tìrààre tìn ɓi mɛ̀kòò, à ki tɔ̀si nyi mɔ rì tyòŋ tii; fɔɔnnɛ mɛ̀rùù mɛ tirààre mɛ saàghà naa bimiɗ.
Nni kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus lɛ Zyudas Iskariyot ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛ̀ngà nyi kì kàɓi, à kpaaghà lɛ:
Ɓi cɛ nnɛ ɓaa kàɓi ɓi tirààre tìn ɓɛ̀tɔɔsìm ɓɛraa ɓɛ fa mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ̀n ɗì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha
À kpaaghà ɓi fɔlɔɔ lɛ à ɓiisɛ̀ngà kì ɓɔmì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha, wɔ̀lɛ à kpaaghà lɔŋ fɔlɔɔ lɛ, à ɓaghà wiiwìì. Nni yɛ̀ɛ nyi yɛɛ m̀ɓègì ɓàm à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, àa ntekì mɔ̀ɔ̀ni mɛ ɓɛ nfogì miì.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà lɛ: Càra nyi a nyam tìrààre tìn ɓi ŋwos anɛ ɓɛ ri ɓòm mɛ.
Ɓì rì rì ɓɛ̀soghàsogha ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm, kìɓan kifog mɛ̀ màa ɓa ti ɓi ri mìni ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm.
Kìtuu ki Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ki wokà lɛ Yeesus à rì a Bɛtanii, nni ɓɛ yughày wɔɔ, àa lɔŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ nyi, ɓɛ yughày girig lɛ ɓɛɛ ghɛǹ Lazaari ànɛ Yeesus à ghèmzìghà ɓi zɔ̀ŋ.
Ɓɛ̀pìrɛɛtìrɛ̀ ɓɛgwey ɓɛ rengà lɛ ɓɛɛ wey girig Lazaari.
Ɓisuulɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ghɛŋìghà ɓɔ, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì gherɛɛ Yeesus lɛ kìɓan kii.
Ɓi duri tana ɓum lɛɛ̀gwey ɓɛ ɓɛ yughà tìcàɓ ti Paskà ɓɛ wokà lɛ, Yeesus a yùyu a Yorisalɛm.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ tekà maŋ mɛ mɛtɛn ɓɛ kpaŋ lɛ ɓɛɛ kɛǹ nyi kìɓoŋì. Ɓɛ kpaakpàà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ozana! Bɛ̀ll a maŋ rìfòm ɗi Isirayɛl, roànɛ a yùu yì ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan.
Yeesus à ghɛngà man à jàɗki, à ɓɔg mii aɗyoo lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri kìkànɛn lɛ:
Wɔ̀ gɔ̀n ì Siyon, kɔ̀ɔ risi, ghɛna rìfòm ɗyɔɔ ɗi riì ɓi man à jàɗki aɗyoò.

Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ Yeesus ɓɛ yighà ɓi azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ɓi cààmɛ̀n kiǹ; kìɓan kifog yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à ɓaghà di à mɛ teɗ rikem, fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ yitìghà min lɛ, ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ɓaghà ɓìkànɛn ɓisu wii, nni ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓɛ kighà nyi lɔ̀ɔ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ gwìy ì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus, cààmɛ̀n ki à regìghà Lazaari lɛ a kpaŋ yi ɓi zɔ̀ŋ, à ghèmzì nyi, ì kalìghà kìɓan ki ɓɛ ghɛngà kiǹ.
Fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ kighà lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kɛǹ nyi kìɓoŋì lɛɛ̀gwey, lɛ ɓɛ wokà lɛ à kìghà dàm ì kìɓan inɛ̀n.
Nni Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ kpaaghà min wɔɔ ɓɔ rì ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì ghɛɛ! ɓyàa kpaŋzɛn ɓi kiɓan ki, ghɛɛnà yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ mɛ nɔ̀ɔ̀ti nyi.
Ɓum ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ a Gìrɛg ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi nɗaŋ wu ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɓɔkày a Yorisalɛm lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Bɛ̀ll ɓi cààmɛ̀n à tìcàɓ.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓɛ kɛngà yɛ̀ɛ Filiɓ ànɛ à ɓaghà ŋwaànɛ a Bɛdsayida ɓi zi ì Galile, ɓɛ tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan ti kɔ̀nkɔn lɛ ti ghɛǹ Yeesus.
Nni Filiɓ à kɛ̀ngà kì kpaà Andire fɔlɔɔ, ɓɛ ki ɓasɛn min lɛ rì nyi rì Andire, ɓɛ kɛǹ kì kpaa Yeesus.
Yeesus à ɓàg ɓɔ lɛ: Cààmɛ̀n ki lɛ Man à mum a teɗ rìkem ki kpaŋi.
Ǹkalii mìni ɓi saaɗ lɛ: I ɗis ɗi bààzì ɗi kpii ɓi ɓi zi ɗi wu, di ɗi rɔɓi lɔŋ ɗyɔ rì ɗyɔ, wɔ̀lɛ i ɗi wii ɗi ɓa tì rì mis mɛdɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey.
Nni ŋwaànɛ à keesii cɛɓ kii, à rì kɔ ɓiì ɗimzii; roànɛ à ɓèèzɛɛ cɛɓ kii ɓi ziinɛ, nnyɛɛ ri ɓiì ɓèŋi kɔ ɓisuu cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
I mum à kɔ̀ni lɛ a ki mɛ̀ kìsay, a nɔɔ̀ti mɛ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ǹkìì-kìsay wɛm̀ à ɓiì ɓaà jàŋ inɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì. Seŋi wɛ̀m à ɓiì ki kemzii ŋwaànɛ a kìki mɛ kìsay.

Ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, ǹɗem wɛ̀m wu ri wù ɓùùsɛn, ǹɗì lɛ ǹkpaa la? Nkpaà nya lɛ Tààta, ghɛɓsi mɛ̀ ɓi kìɓan ki ki yuu kì ghɛnɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀ ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki? Wɔ̀lɛ ɓisuu cààmɛ̀n kɔm̀ kiǹ nnɛ ǹ-yùghà.
Tààta, kemzi ɗii ɗyɔɔ. Nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ɓaghày aɗyoo lɛ: M̀mɛ kemzi ɗyɔ, m̀ɓiì ki kemzii ti ɗyɔ̀.
Gwìy ì ɓum ìnɛ ì ɓaghà wɔɔ, ì wokà jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn, ì kpaa lɛ: Baàbàn yɛ̀ɛ ɓoogh. Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛmbog lɛ: Ŋwaàfìtom yɛɛ toòghrɛɛ rì nyi.
Fɔɔnnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓɔ lɛ: Àa ɓisu wɛ̀m nnɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛn yàa tòòghrɛɛ.
Ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki, kìɓan ki ziinɛ ki yuù kì renɛɛ, ɓigomìnɛ. Ɓɛ yuù kì màagh rifòm ɗi ziinɛ ɓi dan.
Nni mɛ̀ ǹɗì ɓiì ɓaà lɛ, i ɓɛ mɛ pisi mɛ ɓi zi, ɓɛ ɓɔgsì mɛ̀ aɗyoo, ǹsyòŋ yì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀.
À kpaaghà fɔlɔɔ lɛ a resi rìkuu ɗi riwù ɗi à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì wiì.

Nni gwìy ìnɛn ì ɓàkà nyi lɛ: Ɓìsii yilàkà ɓi ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna lɛ: Kiris à ɓiì kɔ̀rii fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Nni lannɛ ù kpaa lɛ: Ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓɔgsi Man à mum aɗyoo? Ghɛn yɛɛ ri kɔm̀ Man à mum àncèm?

Yeesus à kpaa ɓɔ lɛ: Kìtɛɛtɛn ki kaka a lɔ̀ŋkin ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, fɔɔnnɛ kɛ̀ɛ̀ghiina, cààmɛ̀n ki ɓì kaka rì kìtɛɛtɛ̀n; lɛ, birìm yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ràɗ mini. Ŋwaànɛ a kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛɛ ɓi birìm à yii ɓi fe nnɛ a kɛ̀nkɛ̀n.
Cààmɛ̀n ki ɓì rì rì kìtɛɛtɛn, gherɛɛna kɔ, di fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ɓi ɓa ɓɔn ɓɛ kitɛɛtɛn. Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, nni à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà à kɛ̀n kìnyamzɛɛ fìràɓ.
Nsoò yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus à kìghà dàm yi ɓiɓan lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mis maa, ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓi nyi,
lɛ kɛɛ kilɛn lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaŋzì-ɓìɓan Ezayii à kpaaghà lɛ: Kan, ghɛn yɛɛ gherɛ̀ngà ɓɔlɛ ànɛ tì kpaaghà? Càg ki Kan ki resɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ ghɛn?
Ɓɛ ɓaghà ɓi lɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀n ɓisuulɛ Ezayii à kpaatìghà lɛ:

À ɗiŋzìghà ɓɔ tìɗyaŋ, à ki kì lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa ti ri syeesyee à ɗyomzɛ̀n, lɛ ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ghɛnɛn ti rì mis maa, mɛ̀rem maa mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ fègti kiɓan ki syeesyee, lɛ ɓɛ ɓiì ki lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛɛ mɛrem, ǹki wɔ̀ɔ̀zi ɓɔ.
Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki Ezayii à kalìghà yɛ̀ɛ à ghɛngà rìkem ɗi Yeesus, ɓi cààmɛ̀n ki à kpaakpààghà kìɓan kii.
Nsoò fɔlɔɔ mɛ̀fòm mɛ Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n mɛdɛŋ lɛɛ̀gwey mɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi, kìɓan kifog, ɓɛ resìghà ɓi kiɓan kiǹ lɛ tɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ɓi mis mɛ ɓum, lɛ Ɓɛ̀fàrìzyɛŋ ɓɛ ɓiì ki nàɓi ɓɔ ɓi naà-bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓɛ ɓiisɛ̀ngà kì kɔ̀ni rikem ɗi ɓum à cee ɗi Bɛ̀ll.
Nni Yeesus à kpaaghà jɛ̀ɛ̀ aɗyoo lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, à gherɛɛ ɓi lɔŋ lɛ mɛ̀, à gherɛɛ girig roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
I mum à ghɛɛ mɛ̀, di à ghɛɛ roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Mɛ̀ ǹ-yùghà ɓi ziinɛ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìtɛɛtɛn, lɛ mum ǹcèm ànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa ɓi birìm.
I mum à woogh ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀, kɛ̀ɛ ɓèŋ ɓyɔ, àa mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri nyi ɓiì faà bɛ̀lɛn, lɛ ǹ-yùghà ɓi ki faà ziinɛ bɛ̀lɛn, ǹ-yùghà lɔŋ lɛ nghɛɓsi yɔ̀.
Nni ŋwaànɛ à ɓèni mɛ̀, kɛ̀ɛ ghàɓ ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀, à rì rì ŋwaànɛ à ɓiì renì kìɓan kii. Ɓìɓan ɓi ǹkalìghà ɓyɛɛ ri ren kiɓan kii ɓi siitòn a ŋwos.
Lɛ ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpàà, ɓi yin ɓiɓan ɓyɛm̀ ɓi mɛ̀ɛmiɗ, lɔŋ Tààta nyimiɗ anɛ à romgày mɛ̀, nnyɛɛ siŋdɛ̀ngà mɛ̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì kpaà, rì ɓi ǹghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì rèsaagh ɓum.
Fɔɔnnɛ ǹ-yii lɛ ǹsiŋdɛn wii wu ri cɛɓ ki fiɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀. Nni ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpàà, mɛ̀ɛ nkpaakpaa lɔŋ ɓyɔ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta à kalìghà mɛ̀ lɛ ǹkpaà.

Di tìcàɓ ti Paskà ti kakay, Yeesus à yighà lɛ cààmɛ̀n kii ki lɛ a pɛsɛn ɓi ziinɛ a kɛǹ yɛ̀ɛ Seŋi ki kpaŋi. À keesìghà ɓum ɓii ɓɛ ɓɛ ɓaghà fɛ ɓi ziinɛ; nni à keesìghà ɓɔ, à kpaŋ a sugtag.
Yɛ̀ɛ Yeesus rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà, di Satàn à mɛ ɗiŋzi Zyudas à man à Simɔn, fèg ànɛ lɛ a tɔkɛn Yeesus ɓi nɗem,
Yeesus à yighà lɛ Seŋi à faghà ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓyàg ɓii, à ki yi lɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngày yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll, nni wɔɔ nnɛ à yùu kì sugtii,
fɔɔnnɛ à pɛ̀sɛ̀ngà aɗyoo, à sɔ̀ŋɗɛ̀n ɓìlàà, à teɗ sànjà, à sìnɛ̀n ɓi kìɓon.
Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn nnɛ à sùùrìghà mɛ̀nig ɓi taasà, à tumɛ̀n ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii rìsòò ɗi mɛkòò di a tɔ̀tɔsi mɔ rì sànjà ànɛ à ɗyeɓɓɛ̀ngà yɛ̀ɛ kànɗa.
Yɛ̀ɛ à kpagà yɛ̀ɛ Simɔn Pyɛɛri, Simɔn à tɔg nyi lɛ: Kan! Lɔŋ wɔ̀ yɛɛ soò mɛ̀ mɛ̀kòo?
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ, ù yii ɓi azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan ki nkìki ki, wɔ̀lɛ ù rì nyi ɓiì siitɛɛ ki yiì ajɛ̀m.
Pyɛɛri à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ɓɛ̀pwàà! wàa sòò ɓi mɛ mɛ̀kòò nsoò ŋwos bog. Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I ǹsòo ɓi wɔ mɛ̀kòò, wàa ɓa ɓi ri gàɓ a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀.
Simɔn à kpaa min nyi lɛ: Kan, kɔ̀ɔ sòò lɔŋ mɛ mɛ̀kòò mɔ rì mɔ, u soò mɛ̀ girig lɛ, rì ɓyàg, rì ǹto.

Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Ŋwaànɛ à mɛ wùɓɓɛ̀n, à yin lɛ ɓɛ wuɓsì tì nyi, i ki cee ɓi lɛ mɛ̀kòò mii mɛɛ̀mɛ ɓɛ soò, lɛ nyoo yìì bimiɗ ì rì ǹtɛnɛn. Nni, mìnii ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn, wɔ̀lɛ, àa mìniìcèm.
Yeesus à yighà ŋwaànɛ à rì nyi ɓiì tɔ̀kɛɛ, kɛɛ̀ki à kpaaghà miì lɛ: Ɓì yin ɓɛtɛnɛn ɓɛsɛ̀ɛ̀ ɓɛ̀cèm.
Yɛ̀ɛ à lègsìghà kìsòo mɛkòò, à pɛ̀ɛ̀zɛ̀n kì waatɛɛ ɓilàà, nni à sugtìghà kì kɔ̀rii ɓi zi, à tɔg ɓɔ lɛ: Ɓì yii azi anɛ ɓi kìɓan ki ǹkìi mìni kìn?
Ɓì ti ɓì regì mɛ̀ lɛ ǹɗèsàg, ɓì regì tì mɛ̀ lɛ Kan, ɓì ki ti ɓì kpaaghì miì lɛ ǹɗì ǹɗèsàg, mɛ̀ tì Kan.
Nni i màànɛ ǹɗì Kan, mɛ̀ ǹɗèsàg ǹsòo mìni mɛ̀kòò, mìni girig, ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì sòòraagh mɛkòò mìni rì mìni.
Lɛ ǹfaa mìni kìfèèghrɛnà lɛ di mìni girig ɓi kilag yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹkìi yì mìni.
Ǹkpaa mìni kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à rìkpaa lɛ: ǹkìì-kìsay adɛŋ à cee ɓi masà wìì; ǹkɛ̀nì-fìtom kɛ̀ɛ ki cee ŋwaànɛ à romi nyi.
I ɓì yii ɓìɓan ɓiǹ, di ɓì rì ɓɛ̀mààghmaagh, nni kɛɛ̀ tɔtɔg lɛ ɓi ki ɓyɔ̀.

Àa ɓisuu miniìcèm nnɛ ǹkpaa kìɓan kiǹ. Mɛ̀ ǹ-yii ɓɛ̀roɓɛ m̀ɓɔ̀ngà wɔ̀lɛ, ki ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ì rì ǹkànɛn lɛ: Roànɛ ti ɗiɗi bìrɛs yɛ̀m ɓɛɛ̀ nyi à ghali mɛ̀ ŋaŋ-ŋaŋ ɓi nyoo, yɛ̀ɛ roǹ.
Ǹkpaa mìni kɔ ɓigomìnɛ di ki ka kilɛn ɓi, lɛ yɛ̀ɛ ki ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ɓì gherɛ̀n lɛ Mɛ̀ ǹɗì roànɛ ǹɗì.
Ǹkpaa mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, i mum à ghàɓi mum wɛm̀ à fìtom, di mɛ̀ nnɛ à ghàɓi, i mum à ki ghàɓi mɛ̀, di à ghàɓi roànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Yeesus à ɓaghà lɛ, à mɛ kpaa fɔlɔɔ nni nɗem wu ɓuùsɛ̀ngà nyi ɓi ɗùm, à kalì lɛ: Ǹkpaa mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ kìbog ki ɓi mìni ki ri mɛ̀ ɓiì kàɓi.
Ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛ pɛɓsɛ̀n ɓɔmiɗ a mɛ̀su, ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ yi ghɛn innɛ à kpaakpààghà.
Kìbog ki ɓi ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓii ki àa nkeesàg ki kɔkɔ̀rìghà nyi jàŋbog.
Simɔn Pyɛɛri à tòòghrɛ̀n ɗì ǹ-yilàg ànɛ̀n ɗì càg lɛ, a tɔg nyi ghɛn innɛ a kpaaghì.
Nni ǹ-yilàg àncèm à loŋmɛ̀ngà Yeesus ɓi-reè, à kpaa lɛ: Kan ghɛn innɛ u kalàg?
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Lɔŋ roànɛ m̀ɓiì nɔ̀ɔgh bìrɛs ǹfa rì nyi nnɛ nkalàg. Nni à nɔ̀kà kìɓɛghà ki bìrɛs à fa rì Zyudas à man à Simɔn Iskariyot.
Lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas à ghàɓkà kìɓɛghà ki bìrɛs kiǹ, Satàn a ɗiŋì nyi ɓi nɗem. Yeesus à kalì nyi lɛ: Com ki u ɓeɓeg lɛ u ki, kìya kɔ lɛ fyɛ̀ɗ.
Ŋwaàdɛŋ ànɛ ɓi ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ ɗiɗìghà ɓìɗilàg ɓiǹ, à yighà ɓi ɓisuucɛ nnɛ Yeesus à kpaaghà nyi fɔ̀lɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓɛ̀ro ɓɛdɛŋ ɓɛ fefèkà lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas àa nti à ɓègì ɓàm à mɔ̀ɔ̀ni, nnɛ Yeesus à kpaakpààghà nyi lɛ a lag ɓyom ɓi ɓi ghɛɛ̀sɛɛ rì ɓɔ ɓisuu ticàɓ, nsoò lɛ a fa ɓɛ̀soghàsogha com.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas à ghàɓkà kìɓɛghà ki bìrɛs, à ghàs kì kpaŋì. Ìru wu ɓaghà di wu mɛ fìn.
Yɛ̀ɛ Zyudas à ɓaghà di à mɛ kpaŋ ɓi dan, nni Yeesus à kalìghà lɛ: Ɓigomìnɛ, Man à mum à mɛ kem, Bɛ̀ll à mɛ kem girig ɓi nyi.
I Bɛ̀ll à mɛ kem ɓi nyi, cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg Bɛ̀ll à rì girig nyi ɓiì kemzii ɓi nyimiɗ.
Ɓɔn ɓɛm, ǹkaka tì rì mìni ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n. Ɓì rì mɛ̀ ɓiì kaà fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkalìghà rì Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ: Jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ, ɓì yin lɛ ɓì yù wɔɔ. Ǹkpaa girig mìni fɔlɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ.
Ǹfaa mìni kìdɔ̀gsɛna ki nyɔn lɛ: Kɔ̀nɛɛna. Fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀ ǹkeesìghà mìni, mìni girig, kɔ̀nɛɛnà.
I ɓì kɔ̀nɛɛ, ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ri ɓiì yiì lɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀yilàg ɓɛm.
Nni Simɔn Pyɛɛri à tɔkà nyi lɛ: Kan fennɛ ù rì ɓiì kɛ̀ɛ? Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ, ù yin lɛ ù nɔ̀ɔ̀tì mɛ̀ wɔɔ ɓigomìnɛ; kìɓan kifog ù ri nɔ̀ɔ̀tii gɛ mɛ̀ ajɛ̀m.
Pyɛɛri à kpaa nyi lɛ: Lɛ cɛ nnɛ ǹ-yin lɛ ǹnɔ̀ɔ̀tì wɔ̀ ɓigomìnɛ? Ǹɗì m̀pègsɛn lɛ nɗimzi cɛɓ kɛ̀m ɓisu wɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ù ɓiì ɗimzii cɛɓ kɔɔ ɓisu wɛ̀m ɛ̀ɛ? Ǹkpaa wɔ̀ saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, ù rì mɛ̀ ɓiì roòzɛɛ gɛ̀n yiraa di ǹlem à zag a ka rɔŋ ɓi.
Mɛ̀rem min mɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓùùsɛn, gherɛɛna Bɛ̀ll, ɓì gherɛ̀n girig mɛ̀.
Ɓìden ɓi naa ɓi ri lɛɛ̀gwey ɓi mɛɛ mɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m; i kɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ɓa fɔlɔɔ, di ǹkalìghà mìni. Ǹkɛ̀ɛ mìni kì pègsɛɛ jàŋ.
M̀ɓiì ɓaà lɛ, i ǹkɛ̀ɛ, i m̀mɛ pègsɛn mini jàŋ, ǹsugtìì lɛ nteɗ mìni a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, lɛ di mìni girig, ɓi ɓa jàŋ inɛ mɛ̀ ǹɗì.
Ɓì yii bee inɛ ɓi jàŋ inɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ.
Nni Tomas à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan! Tì yii ɓi jàŋ inɛ ù kɛ̀ɛ, nni lannɛ tì rì lɛ tì yi bee inɛ ì kɛ̀ɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀?
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: Mɛ̀ yɛɛ ri bee, rì saaɗ, rì cɛɓ. Mum à yin lɛ à kpaŋ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta di à fyee ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀.
I ɓyàa yi mɛ̀, di ɓì rì lɛ ɓì yi Seŋi wɛ̀m. Nni à tumɛ̀n ɓigomìnɛ, ɓì yii nyi, ɓì mɛ ki ghɛn nyi.
Nni Filiɓ à kpaaghà nyi lɛ: Kan rèsi ɓìsi Tààta, mɛ̀rem mis mɛɛ kpi ɓi mùm.
Yeesus à kpaa nyi lɛ: Filiɓ, fìɗyàɓ fi maà ɓa rì mìni, ù ka yighà ɓi mɛ? Ŋwaànɛ à mɛ ghɛn mɛ, à mɛ ghɛn Tààta, nni lannɛ ù kpaa lɛ rèsi ɓìsi Tààta?
Ù gherɛɛ ɓi lɛ, ki ri lɛ mɛ̀ ɓi Tààta, Tààta ɓi mɛ̀? Ɓìɓan ɓi nkpaakpaa mini ɓi, ɓi yin ɓiɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛmiɗ yɛɛ ɓekii lɛ nkpaà, lɔŋ Tààta ànɛ à rì a lɔ̀ŋkɛm̀, yɛɛ̀ kìki ɓiɓan ɓii.
Gherɛɛna mɛ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkpaa mìni lɛ, ki ri lɛ mɛ̀ ɓi Tààta, Tààta ɓi mɛ̀; i ɓì ɓèni fɔlɔɔ, ɓì gherɛ̀n ɓisuu ɓiɓan ɓi nkìkì.
Ǹkalii mìni saaɗ à rìkpaa lɛ, ŋwaànɛ à gherɛɛ mɛ̀, à ɓiì kìi girig ɓìɓan ɓi mɛ̀ɛ nkìkì, à ki kì kɔm̀ ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi cee ɓiǹ ɓisuulɛ ǹkɛ̀ɛ yɛ̀ɛ Tààta.
Fɔɔnnɛ com kìcèm ki ɓì rì ɓiì tɔɔ̀gh rì ɗii ɗyɛ̀m, ǹɗì mìni kɔ ɓiì kìi, lɛ Tààta a teɗ rìkem ɓi Man.
I ɓì tɔɔgh com rì ɗii ɗyɛ̀m m̀ɓiì kìi kɔ.
I ɓì keesii mɛ̀, ɓì ɓiì ɓèŋi ɓidɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ m̀ɓiì ɓɔ̀ŋzii Tààta, à rom yì mìni m̀maasì mɛ̀rem adɛŋ, ànɛ à ɓa rì mìni fìɗyàɓ fikɔ̀ɔ̀.
Nnyɛɛ ri Ǹghay à ɓɛ̀kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ ɓɛ ɓiɓan ànɛ ziinɛ ì yin lɛ ì teɗ, ɓisuulɛ ì ghɛɛ ɓi nyi, yɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi nyi. Lɔŋ mìni yɛɛ yii nyi ɓisuulɛ à rì ɓi mìni.
Màa càɗ ɓi mini ɓɔɔ̀zii, ǹɗì ɓiì sugtii yi a lɔ̀ŋkin.
Cààmɛ̀n lɛsàg ziinɛ yàa ghɛɛ̀di ɓi mɛ, lɔŋ mìni yɛɛ ri mɛ̀ ɓiì seesee ɓisuulɛ ǹɗì cem, nni mìni girig ɓì ɓiì ɓaà rì cɛɓ.
Ŋwos anɛ̀n ɓì yii gɛ lɛ, ǹɗì ɓi Seŋi wɛ̀m, mìni ɓi mɛ̀, mɛ̀ ɓi mìni.
Ŋwaànɛ à rì rì ɓìdɔ̀gsɛna ɓyɛm̀ à ki ɓèŋ ɓyɔ, nnyɛɛ keesii mɛ̀. Nni ŋwaànɛ à keesii mɛ̀ innɛ Seŋi wɛ̀m à ɓiì kesii, mɛ̀ ǹkeesì girig nyi, ǹki rèsɛn nyi lɛ a yi mɛ̀.
Fɔɔnnɛ Zyuudɛ, àa roànɛ lɛ Iskariyot, a kpaaghi nyi lɛ: Kan! Ki ɓaa la lɛ ɓìsi ɓɛɛ̀ɓɛ u resɛn lɛ ti yi wɔ̀, kɔ̀ɔ rèsɛn ziinɛ?
Yeesus à ɓàg nyi lɛ: I mum à keesii mɛ̀, à ɓiì ɓèŋi jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, Seŋi wɛ̀m à rì nyi ɓiì keesi; tì ɓiì yùu a lɔ̀ŋkii, tì pègsɛ̀n ìkɔ̀ɔ̀ wis a lɔ̀ŋkii.
Mum ànɛ à kessi ɓi mɛ, à yin lɛ à ɓèŋ ɓìɓan ɓyɛm̀; nni jɛ̀ɛ̀ ìnɛ ɓi wowog inɛ, ì yin jɛ̀ɛ̀ yɛ̀m, ì rì lɔŋ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Tààta ànɛ à romgày mɛ̀.
Ǹkpaa mìni ɓìɓan ɓiǹ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkaka lɛ rì mìni.
